TEXT.English: The %s1 Trading Company asks for the control of %s3 and offers %d2 gold. Refusal will lead to war. Shall we accept their offer?
TEXT.Chinese: %s1贸易公司向您索要%s3的控制权以及%d2金币。 拒绝将会导致战争。我们是否同意他们的要求？

TEXT.English: The %s1 Trading Company
TEXT.Chinese: %s1贸易公司

TEXT.English: Allow their recovery teams unfettered access to the crash site.
TEXT.Chinese: Allow their recovery teams unfettered access to the crash site.

TEXT.English: Stall them for time while your own team learns what it can first.
TEXT.Chinese: Stall them for time while your own team learns what it can first.

TEXT.English: Deny access. Claim the wreckage and let your engineers pore over it.
TEXT.Chinese: Deny access. Claim the wreckage and let your engineers pore over it.

TEXT.English: One of your passenger airliners has crashed in %s1_civ_adjective territory. They have allowed unrestricted access to your recovery teams, building trust between your two nations.
TEXT.Chinese: 一架我国客机%s1_civ_adjective境内坠毁。对方允许我们的救援队自由前往现场，以在两国间建立互信。

TEXT.English: One of your passenger airliners has crashed in %s1_civ_adjective territory. They seemed to be unsure how to react at first, but finally allowed your recovery teams access to the crash site.
TEXT.Chinese: 一架我国客机在%s1_civ_adjective境内坠毁。经过一番交涉，对方最终同意我们的救援队前往现场。

TEXT.English: One of your passenger airliners has crashed in %s1_civ_adjective territory. They are denying all access and have claimed the wreckage as their own. This outrage has angered your people and driven a diplomatic wedge between your two nations.
TEXT.Chinese: 一架我国客机在%s1_civ_adjective境内坠毁。对方禁止我们的救援队入境并将飞机残骸据为己有。这种行为激起了我国人民的愤怒，两国外交关系陷入僵局。

TEXT.English: Disperse the texts to various researchers and specialists, to see what we might learn.
TEXT.Chinese: Disperse the texts to various researchers and specialists, to see what we might learn.

TEXT.English: Fund an effort to preserve these artifacts in museums, accessible only to the most careful scholars.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund an effort to preserve these artifacts in museums, accessible only to the most careful scholars.

TEXT.English: These Games are honorable, but overall their importance to our civilization is minor.
TEXT.Chinese: These Games are honorable, but overall their importance to our civilization is minor.

TEXT.English: These Games are grand! We should invite and sponsor athletes from neighboring civilizations to attend.
TEXT.Chinese: These Games are grand! We should invite and sponsor athletes from neighboring civilizations to attend.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive a %D1 diplomatic boost with all your close neighbors
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Receive a %D1 diplomatic boost with all your close neighbors

TEXT.English: The extra patients will enhance city revenue.
TEXT.Chinese: The extra patients will enhance city revenue.

TEXT.English: We could sanction the hospital as a state holy site. This may please the local populace.
TEXT.Chinese: We could sanction the hospital as a state holy site. This may please the local populace.

TEXT.English: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.
TEXT.Chinese: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.

TEXT.English: Commit our government to harvesting this new resource immediately.
TEXT.Chinese: Commit our government to harvesting this new resource immediately.

TEXT.English: Anti-monarchists are claiming that the King has too much power and that religious leaders need to have some, too.
TEXT.Chinese: Anti-monarchists are claiming that the King has too much power and that religious leaders need to have some, too.

TEXT.English: Our King is the State!
TEXT.Chinese: Our King is the State!

TEXT.English: It's a valid point, our clerics need more influence.
TEXT.Chinese: It's a valid point, our clerics need more influence.

TEXT.English: How many trees were planted? That's amazing!
TEXT.Chinese: How many trees were planted? That's amazing!

TEXT.English: Decorate our glorious heroes of the sword!
TEXT.Chinese: Decorate our glorious heroes of the sword!

TEXT.English: Convert our axemen to the new axe handles immediately.
TEXT.Chinese: Convert our axemen to the new axe handles immediately.

TEXT.English: Our people are thriving in peace time.
TEXT.Chinese: Our people are thriving in peace time.

TEXT.English: Mmm, ice cream. The customers must be going bananas over that!
TEXT.Chinese: Mmm, ice cream. The customers must be going bananas over that!

TEXT.English: We are likely to take the worst of the barbarian horde's fury.
TEXT.Chinese: We are likely to take the worst of the barbarian horde's fury.

TEXT.English: We are glad to see that the local culture is thriving.
TEXT.Chinese: We are glad to see that the local culture is thriving.

TEXT.English: Fund the writing of a play that revolves around this ballad, to be performed at the local Theatre.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund the writing of a play that revolves around this ballad, to be performed at the local Theatre.

TEXT.English: See that the artist is given a recording contract.
TEXT.Chinese: See that the artist is given a recording contract.

TEXT.English: Our investigations have turned up no worthwhile results? This is most peculiar.
TEXT.Chinese: Our investigations have turned up no worthwhile results? This is most peculiar.

TEXT.English: The Best Defense[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your armed forces to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] for them to ward off invasion effectively.
TEXT.Chinese: The Best Defense[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your armed forces to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] for them to ward off invasion effectively.

TEXT.English: Use our advantage to help better train our forces.
TEXT.Chinese: Use our advantage to help better train our forces.

TEXT.English: Leverage our defensive advantage in to political capital.
TEXT.Chinese: Leverage our defensive advantage in to political capital.

TEXT.English: Now that we are safe, focus on learning what others are planning.
TEXT.Chinese: Now that we are safe, focus on learning what others are planning.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] attitude from all leaders
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Receive [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] attitude from all leaders

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] in your cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls the Great Wall.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economics[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] in your cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls the Great Wall.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economics[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: Our scientists have developed better ways of processing coal fuel. Our economy stands ready to benefit from this development.
TEXT.Chinese: Our scientists have developed better ways of processing coal fuel. Our economy stands ready to benefit from this development.

TEXT.English: Put it to use at our Coal-fueled power plants. Production is power!
TEXT.Chinese: Put it to use at our Coal-fueled power plants. Production is power!

TEXT.English: I suppose we can make our Drydocks a more healthy place to work and slightly more productive, then.
TEXT.Chinese: I suppose we can make our Drydocks a more healthy place to work and slightly more productive, then.

TEXT.English: Let them keep the secret. We are happy enough to tax their higher profits.
TEXT.Chinese: Let them keep the secret. We are happy enough to tax their higher profits.

TEXT.English: The Blessed Sea[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your religious leaders to found cities on new landmasses. If you can build enough cities on new landmasses you will please the masters, who will offer you a choice of rewards.
TEXT.Chinese: The Blessed Sea[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your religious leaders to found cities on new landmasses. If you can build enough cities on new landmasses you will please the masters, who will offer you a choice of rewards.

TEXT.English: Establish your religion in a number of your cities.
TEXT.Chinese: Establish your religion in a number of your cities.

TEXT.English: Receive a Temple improvement in all cities with five population or more, where your State Religion is present.
TEXT.Chinese: Receive a Temple improvement in all cities with five population or more, where your State Religion is present.

TEXT.English: Receive a Great Prophet.
TEXT.Chinese: Receive a Great Prophet.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must establish or capture cities on %d1 total landmasses of any size, from one-plot islands to massive continents. All landmasses where you have at least one city are counted. Note that additional cities on the same island or continent do not help in this quest. The goal is to establish your presence on a number of different landmasses and thereby prove your mastery over the waters.[PARAGRAPH:1] You will fail this quest if you change state religions, cease to have a state religion or reach [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must establish or capture cities on %d1 total landmasses of any size, from one-plot islands to massive continents. All landmasses where you have at least one city are counted. Note that additional cities on the same island or continent do not help in this quest. The goal is to establish your presence on a number of different landmasses and thereby prove your mastery over the waters.[PARAGRAPH:1] You will fail this quest if you change state religions, cease to have a state religion or reach [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: The rescue and recovery efforts are best handled by the locals.
TEXT.Chinese: The rescue and recovery efforts are best handled by the locals.

TEXT.English: Organize and send assistance to help them dig out and to preserve threatened facilities.
TEXT.Chinese: Organize and send assistance to help them dig out and to preserve threatened facilities.

TEXT.English: We will include the new design principles in all of our bowmaking.
TEXT.Chinese: We will include the new design principles in all of our bowmaking.

TEXT.English: Good job, knowledge is power!
TEXT.Chinese: Good job, knowledge is power!

TEXT.English: The dam in %s2_city has broken. The city's suburbs are flooded and deaths have been reported.
TEXT.Chinese: The dam in %s2_city has broken. The city's suburbs are flooded and deaths have been reported.

TEXT.English: That is very unfortunate, but we can not help. Tell the local authorities they'll have to handle the situation.
TEXT.Chinese: That is very unfortunate, but we can not help. Tell the local authorities they'll have to handle the situation.

TEXT.English: Repair the dam from our emergency funds.
TEXT.Chinese: Repair the dam from our emergency funds.

TEXT.English: Repair the dam and provide compensation to the affected families.
TEXT.Chinese: Repair the dam and provide compensation to the affected families.

TEXT.English: Although our brothers are in need, it is best not to get involved at this time.
TEXT.Chinese: Although our brothers are in need, it is best not to get involved at this time.

TEXT.English: Offer to send them a large supply of Copper for weapon making.
TEXT.Chinese: Offer to send them a large supply of Copper for weapon making.

TEXT.English: Provide Iron so that they may craft strong weaponry.
TEXT.Chinese: Provide Iron so that they may craft strong weaponry.

TEXT.English: Send large herds of war-trained Horses to our brothers.
TEXT.Chinese: Send large herds of war-trained Horses to our brothers.

TEXT.English: War Elephants are what they need. Send in the jumbos!
TEXT.Chinese: War Elephants are what they need. Send in the jumbos!

TEXT.English: Their vehicles require diesel. Tanks cannot roll without fuel!
TEXT.Chinese: Their vehicles require diesel. Tanks cannot roll without fuel!

TEXT.English: Anything for our brothers in need. There is no limit to our support.
TEXT.Chinese: Anything for our brothers in need. There is no limit to our support.

TEXT.English: Our %s1_civ_adjective religious brothers have gifted us with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] to aid us in our war effort!
TEXT.Chinese: 同我们一样信奉%s1_civ_adjective的兄弟之邦提供了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]资源以资助我们的战争！

TEXT.English: Our %s1_civ_adjective religious brothers have gifted us with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] to aid us in our war effort!
TEXT.Chinese: 同我们一样信奉%s1_civ_adjective的兄弟之邦提供了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]资源以资助我们的战争！

TEXT.English: Our %s1_civ_adjective religious brothers have gifted us with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT] to aid us in our war effort!
TEXT.Chinese: 同我们一样信奉%s1_civ_adjective的兄弟之邦提供了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马匹[COLOR_REVERT]资源以资助我们的战争！

TEXT.English: Our %s1_civ_adjective religious brothers have gifted us with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT] to aid us in our war effort!
TEXT.Chinese: 同我们一样信奉%s1_civ_adjective的兄弟之邦提供了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]资源以资助我们的战争！

TEXT.English: Our %s1_civ_adjective religious brothers have gifted us with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] to aid us in our war effort!
TEXT.Chinese: 同我们一样信奉%s1_civ_adjective的兄弟之邦提供了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]石油[COLOR_REVERT]资源以资助我们的战争！

TEXT.English: Our %s1_civ_adjective religious brothers have gifted us with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT] to aid us in our war effort!
TEXT.Chinese: 同我们一样信奉%s1_civ_adjective的兄弟之邦提供了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铀[COLOR_REVERT]资源以资助我们的战争！

TEXT.English: Organize a rebuilding effort.
TEXT.Chinese: Organize a rebuilding effort.

TEXT.English: Investigate the cause of the fire.
TEXT.Chinese: Investigate the cause of the fire.

TEXT.English: We are too pressed to spare any attention to a small fire.
TEXT.Chinese: We are too pressed to spare any attention to a small fire.

TEXT.English: Decorate our champions! We shall celebrate their achievement.
TEXT.Chinese: Decorate our champions! We shall celebrate their achievement.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Our %s1_unit will gain the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s2_promotion[COLOR_REVERT] promotion
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Our %s1_unit will gain the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s2_promotion[COLOR_REVERT] promotion

TEXT.English: Advise him to focus on his relationship with the armed forces.
TEXT.Chinese: Advise him to focus on his relationship with the armed forces.

TEXT.English: Advise him to focus on domestic harmony and stamping out sources of opposition.
TEXT.Chinese: Advise him to focus on domestic harmony and stamping out sources of opposition.

TEXT.English: Set up a monument at the airport to produce tourism.
TEXT.Chinese: Set up a monument at the airport to produce tourism.

TEXT.English: Organize a rebuilding effort.
TEXT.Chinese: Organize a rebuilding effort.

TEXT.English: Investigate the cause of the fire.
TEXT.Chinese: Investigate the cause of the fire.

TEXT.English: We are too pressed to spare any attention to a fire.
TEXT.Chinese: We are too pressed to spare any attention to a fire.

TEXT.English: Send commendations to the leaders of the exploring party.
TEXT.Chinese: Send commendations to the leaders of the exploring party.

TEXT.English: Fund additional exploratory efforts.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund additional exploratory efforts.

TEXT.English: Send congratulations to the developers. Our people should enjoy this game.
TEXT.Chinese: Send congratulations to the developers. Our people should enjoy this game.

TEXT.English: This game seems to have great educational potential. Suggest that it be used in our educational system.
TEXT.Chinese: This game seems to have great educational potential. Suggest that it be used in our educational system.

TEXT.English: Computer games? They have no place in our society! Sell the franchise to foreign buyers!
TEXT.Chinese: Computer games? They have no place in our society! Sell the franchise to foreign buyers!

TEXT.English: Classic Literature[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by our scholars to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] to hold the newly recorded texts of our ancient stories and oral traditions.
TEXT.Chinese: Classic Literature[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by our scholars to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] to hold the newly recorded texts of our ancient stories and oral traditions.

TEXT.English: Our library with the largest repository of classic literature receives a research bonus.
TEXT.Chinese: Our library with the largest repository of classic literature receives a research bonus.

TEXT.English: Discover and decipher lost knowledge from within some of the literature.
TEXT.Chinese: Discover and decipher lost knowledge from within some of the literature.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] receives additional scholars to help boost research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] receives additional scholars to help boost research.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive a random Technology from among Ancient Era techs not yet discovered.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Receive a random Technology from among Ancient Era techs not yet discovered.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if you control the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] if and when this quest is successfully completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if you control the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] if and when this quest is successfully completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: Clunker coal? What a mess. Less valuable per ton, but it still burns, right? Just deal with it.
TEXT.Chinese: Clunker coal? What a mess. Less valuable per ton, but it still burns, right? Just deal with it.

TEXT.English: What if something even bigger is out there, on a collision course with our world? If so, we must find it. We must get into space!
TEXT.Chinese: What if something even bigger is out there, on a collision course with our world? If so, we must find it. We must get into space!

TEXT.English: A philosopher from %s2_city is stirring up controversy among our population. Our people are highly distrustful of his teachings.
TEXT.Chinese: A philosopher from %s2_city is stirring up controversy among our population. Our people are highly distrustful of his teachings.

TEXT.English: We won't tolerate such heresy. Send him into exile!
TEXT.Chinese: We won't tolerate such heresy. Send him into exile!

TEXT.English: He's a senile old fool. Let him teach if he wants to.
TEXT.Chinese: He's a senile old fool. Let him teach if he wants to.

TEXT.English: That's one exceptional mind! Sponsor an Academy for him to teach!
TEXT.Chinese: That's one exceptional mind! Sponsor an Academy for him to teach!

TEXT.English: Corporate Expansion[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your corporate leaders to expand the reach of their corporation.
TEXT.Chinese: Corporate Expansion[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your corporate leaders to expand the reach of their corporation.

TEXT.English: Cha-ching! Show me the money!
TEXT.Chinese: Cha-ching! Show me the money!

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] to %d2 new cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] to %d2 new cities.

TEXT.English: Let the senators fight amongst themselves. When both sides are weakened, step in and assert presidential authority.
TEXT.Chinese: Let the senators fight amongst themselves. When both sides are weakened, step in and assert presidential authority.

TEXT.English: Support the ruling party in impeaching numerous members of the scandalized party, destroying all effective opposition to the ruling party.
TEXT.Chinese: Support the ruling party in impeaching numerous members of the scandalized party, destroying all effective opposition to the ruling party.

TEXT.English: Rely on judicial authority to enforce the letter of the constitution.
TEXT.Chinese: Rely on judicial authority to enforce the letter of the constitution.

TEXT.English: Crusade[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your religious leaders to capture and occupy the Holy City.
TEXT.Chinese: Crusade[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your religious leaders to capture and occupy the Holy City.

TEXT.English: The Holy City needs more protection. Recruit and train capable units from among the faithful.
TEXT.Chinese: The Holy City needs more protection. Recruit and train capable units from among the faithful.

TEXT.English: Harness the fervor of the believers to construct a Holy Shrine to honor the sacred sites where our faith was born.
TEXT.Chinese: Harness the fervor of the believers to construct a Holy Shrine to honor the sacred sites where our faith was born.

TEXT.English: Spread the word of our success and of the blessings of our faith as far and wide as possible.
TEXT.Chinese: Spread the word of our success and of the blessings of our faith as far and wide as possible.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Add %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:defender:defenders] to %s3_city.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Add %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:defender:defenders] to %s3_city.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_building[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_building[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_religion[COLOR_REVERT] to up to %d2 new [NUM2:city:cities].
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_religion[COLOR_REVERT] to up to %d2 new [NUM2:city:cities].

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization captures %s1_city first, if you change your state religion, or if your war ends for any reason prior to your success.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization captures %s1_city first, if you change your state religion, or if your war ends for any reason prior to your success.

TEXT.English: One of our high-ranking intelligence agents has defected to the %s1_civ_adjective empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 我国的一名高级特工叛变投靠了%s1_civ_adjective的情报部门。

TEXT.English: That's regrettable. We'll need to review our security procedures.
TEXT.Chinese: That's regrettable. We'll need to review our security procedures.

TEXT.English: Unacceptable. An "accident" should happen to the traitor!
TEXT.Chinese: Unacceptable. An "accident" should happen to the traitor!

TEXT.English: A dissident priest from %s2_city is doubting the supreme power of Amun-Re in an unprecedented outbreak of heresy.
TEXT.Chinese: A dissident priest from %s2_city is doubting the supreme power of Amun-Re in an unprecedented outbreak of heresy.

TEXT.English: That is disgusting and preposterous. The heresy must be dealt with in the name of Amun-Re, even if the locals won't support it.
TEXT.Chinese: That is disgusting and preposterous. The heresy must be dealt with in the name of Amun-Re, even if the locals won't support it.

TEXT.English: We can ignore that nutter, our people will get over it.
TEXT.Chinese: We can ignore that nutter, our people will get over it.

TEXT.English: Diversity is good. Allow these beliefs to spread and be recorded, though convincing our people that it's nothing to fear won't be easy.
TEXT.Chinese: Diversity is good. Allow these beliefs to spread and be recorded, though convincing our people that it's nothing to fear won't be easy.

TEXT.English: We need that food. Do whatever it takes to figure out how to mitigate the erosion of the soil and end the dust storms.
TEXT.Chinese: We need that food. Do whatever it takes to figure out how to mitigate the erosion of the soil and end the dust storms.

TEXT.English: We cannot afford to spend gold on this problem. Leave the matter to the local authorities.
TEXT.Chinese: We cannot afford to spend gold on this problem. Leave the matter to the local authorities.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Significant chance the dustbowl will continue
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Significant chance the dustbowl will continue

TEXT.English: Enshrine the day as a national holiday.
TEXT.Chinese: Enshrine the day as a national holiday.

TEXT.English: Fund an international awareness effort in addition to our local efforts.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund an international awareness effort in addition to our local efforts.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Persuade other nations to convert to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Environmentalism[COLOR_REVERT] (at least one civilization must have the ability to do so).
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Persuade other nations to convert to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Environmentalism[COLOR_REVERT] (at least one civilization must have the ability to do so).

TEXT.English: Freedom is the best motivator. We are lucky to have workers like these, who keep the power flowing to our citizenry.
TEXT.Chinese: Freedom is the best motivator. We are lucky to have workers like these, who keep the power flowing to our citizenry.

TEXT.English: Elite Swordsmen[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to train a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: Elite Swordsmen[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to train a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With such a large force of Swordsmen working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.
TEXT.Chinese: With such a large force of Swordsmen working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.

TEXT.English: Our monarch will establish an institution that will enable current and future troops to obtain additional training.
TEXT.Chinese: Our monarch will establish an institution that will enable current and future troops to obtain additional training.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]. A source of Iron will be required.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dynasticism[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]. A source of Iron will be required.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dynasticism[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: The theatre patronage will enhance city revenue.
TEXT.Chinese: The theatre patronage will enhance city revenue.

TEXT.English: We could double the cultural value of the theatre by officially sanctioning this artist's works.
TEXT.Chinese: We could double the cultural value of the theatre by officially sanctioning this artist's works.

TEXT.English: The reputation boost should enhance revenues.
TEXT.Chinese: The reputation boost should enhance revenues.

TEXT.English: We should fund an effort to translate his experience into a format that can be passed on to future generations.
TEXT.Chinese: We should fund an effort to translate his experience into a format that can be passed on to future generations.

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of The Best Defense
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of The Best Defense

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of The Blessed Sea.
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of The Blessed Sea.

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of Classic Literature.
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of Classic Literature.

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Corporate Expansion!
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of the Corporate Expansion!

TEXT.English: Your Crusade has ended. The quest has failed.
TEXT.Chinese: Your Crusade has ended. The quest has failed.

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Elite Swordsmen!
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of the Elite Swordsmen!

TEXT.English: You have failed the Quest of Greed!
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the Quest of Greed!

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of "Guns not Butter!"
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of "Guns not Butter!"

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Harbormaster
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of the Harbormaster

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of The Holy Mountain.
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of The Holy Mountain.

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of Horse Whispering
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of Horse Whispering

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Hostile Takeover!
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of the Hostile Takeover!

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of The Master Blacksmith.
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of The Master Blacksmith.

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of "Noble Knights!"
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of "Noble Knights!"

TEXT.English: All records of ancient games have been forever lost.
TEXT.Chinese: All records of ancient games have been forever lost.

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the "Overwhelm Doctrine!"
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of the "Overwhelm Doctrine!"

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of The National Sports League.
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of The National Sports League.

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the War Chariots!
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of the War Chariots!

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Warships!
TEXT.Chinese: You have failed the quest of the Warships!

TEXT.English: We are unable to assist at this time. Send our condolensces to their leaders.
TEXT.Chinese: We are unable to assist at this time. Send our condolensces to their leaders.

TEXT.English: Open the city granaries and send half the stores to our troubled neighbors.
TEXT.Chinese: Open the city granaries and send half the stores to our troubled neighbors.

TEXT.English: Send all of the food stores! Spare no expense to aid our friends!
TEXT.Chinese: Send all of the food stores! Spare no expense to aid our friends!

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people in %s2_city have sent half their stored food to your city of %s4_city to fend off starvation caused by a poor local harvest. This humanitarian relief may represent a positive turning point in your relations.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city的居民拿出一半粮食储备救助我国遭遇严重饥荒的%s4_city居民。这次无私的人道主义行动也许是两国关系走向全面友好的转折点。

TEXT.English: The generous %s1_civ_adjective people in %s2_city have sent all of their food stores to your city of %s4_city to prevent famine caused by a poor local harvest. This humanitarian effort has brought your two peoples much closer together!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city的居民拿出了全部粮食储备救助我国遭遇严重饥荒的%s4_city居民。这次无私人道主义行动大幅拉近了两国人民的关系。

TEXT.English: We need that food. Do whatever it takes to deal with those bandits.
TEXT.Chinese: We need that food. Do whatever it takes to deal with those bandits.

TEXT.English: Dispatch some of our troops to hunt down these bandits.
TEXT.Chinese: Dispatch some of our troops to hunt down these bandits.

TEXT.English: We are too busy to be bothered. Leave the matter to the local authorities. (Banditry may continue)
TEXT.Chinese: We are too busy to be bothered. Leave the matter to the local authorities. (Banditry may continue)

TEXT.English: This gaffe has adversely affected our relations.
TEXT.Chinese: This gaffe has adversely affected our relations.

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador has committed a faux pas. This insulting gaffe has adversely affected our relations with his country.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective大使发生失礼行为，对我国与该国的关系产生了负面影响。

TEXT.English: No one survives forever. Cash in on the phenomenon before he meets the inevitable end.
TEXT.Chinese: No one survives forever. Cash in on the phenomenon before he meets the inevitable end.

TEXT.English: Arrange for him to be matched against easy opponents and see that his legend increases.
TEXT.Chinese: Arrange for him to be matched against easy opponents and see that his legend increases.

TEXT.English: Let the free market make use of these techniques.
TEXT.Chinese: Let the free market make use of these techniques.

TEXT.English: Fund a national Federal Reserve Bank to carry out the new policy.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund a national Federal Reserve Bank to carry out the new policy.

TEXT.English: Supply our Grenadiers with the improved explosives.
TEXT.Chinese: Supply our Grenadiers with the improved explosives.

TEXT.English: Organize a replanting effort.
TEXT.Chinese: Organize a replanting effort.

TEXT.English: Send emissaries to assist the bereaved.
TEXT.Chinese: Send emissaries to assist the bereaved.

TEXT.English: We are too pressed to spare any aid.
TEXT.Chinese: We are too pressed to spare any aid.

TEXT.English: Excellent.
TEXT.Chinese: Excellent.

TEXT.English: Donate the money raised to the local temples.
TEXT.Chinese: Donate the money raised to the local temples.

TEXT.English: Use the money to fund a public service ad campaign for religious freedom and tolerance.
TEXT.Chinese: Use the money to fund a public service ad campaign for religious freedom and tolerance.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Spread each of the religions present to a new city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Spread each of the religions present to a new city

TEXT.English: This assistance should help our unit recover its strength.
TEXT.Chinese: This assistance should help our unit recover its strength.

TEXT.English: Reduced costs, lower pollution and improved revenues are always welcome news.
TEXT.Chinese: Reduced costs, lower pollution and improved revenues are always welcome news.

TEXT.English: Extradite the offender back to his homeland.
TEXT.Chinese: Extradite the offender back to his homeland.

TEXT.English: Secretly interrogate the prisoner, hoping to learn sensitive information.
TEXT.Chinese: Secretly interrogate the prisoner, hoping to learn sensitive information.

TEXT.English: Release the prisoner. This is none of our affairs.
TEXT.Chinese: Release the prisoner. This is none of our affairs.

TEXT.English: When the boom passes, many of the immigrants will settle down.
TEXT.Chinese: When the boom passes, many of the immigrants will settle down.

TEXT.English: Fund efforts to motivate more of the gold seekers to settle down when the rush ends.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund efforts to motivate more of the gold seekers to settle down when the rush ends.

TEXT.English: A blacksmith working in the Forge of %s2_city has made a beautiful golden statue of Buddha.
TEXT.Chinese: A blacksmith working in the Forge of %s2_city has made a beautiful golden statue of Buddha.

TEXT.English: That's not his job. Sell the statue and remind the blacksmith what his responsibilities are.
TEXT.Chinese: That's not his job. Sell the statue and remind the blacksmith what his responsibilities are.

TEXT.English: Impressive. This should make the Forge a cultural attraction.
TEXT.Chinese: Impressive. This should make the Forge a cultural attraction.

TEXT.English: The blacksmith is a true talent, we should encourage him to make more of these statues.
TEXT.Chinese: The blacksmith is a true talent, we should encourage him to make more of these statues.

TEXT.English: A great beast has been discovered near one of our hunting camps.
TEXT.Chinese: A great beast has been discovered near one of our hunting camps.

TEXT.English: Let it breed and give offspring. Hunt sparingly.
TEXT.Chinese: Let it breed and give offspring. Hunt sparingly.

TEXT.English: Looks like it could feed many people. Organize a hunting party!
TEXT.Chinese: Looks like it could feed many people. Organize a hunting party!

TEXT.English: Hunt it? Are you mad? The beast is a manifestation of a divine spirit!
TEXT.Chinese: Hunt it? Are you mad? The beast is a manifestation of a divine spirit!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] in all cities with %F3_religion for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns].
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] in all cities with %F3_religion for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns].

TEXT.English: There is really not much we can do about this, is there?
TEXT.Chinese: There is really not much we can do about this, is there?

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All nations in the world suffer the loss of %d1%% their national treasury.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]All nations in the world suffer the loss of %d1%% their national treasury.

TEXT.English: We do not want peace! Let the war continue.
TEXT.Chinese: We do not want peace! Let the war continue.

TEXT.English: Peace would benefit both sides. Give our blessing to this mediator, and may his words prove sharper than their hatreds.
TEXT.Chinese: Peace would benefit both sides. Give our blessing to this mediator, and may his words prove sharper than their hatreds.

TEXT.English: A great mediator has offered to arbitrate our grievance with the %s1_civ_adjective Empire. This opens the door to a possible peace treaty. Do you wish to end the war?
TEXT.Chinese: 一位中立国领袖主动提出调停我们与%s1_civ_adjective之间的争端，这开启了通往和平的大门，您希望结束战争吗？

TEXT.English: Greed[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to seize control of that resource.
TEXT.Chinese: Greed[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to seize control of that resource.

TEXT.English: Recruit and train units that take advantage of our new resources.
TEXT.Chinese: Recruit and train units that take advantage of our new resources.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must invade %s1_civ and gain control of the %s2_resource resource.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization captures the target city first, if the city is destroyed, or if %d3 turns pass without achieving the objective.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must invade %s1_civ and gain control of the %s2_resource resource.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization captures the target city first, if the city is destroyed, or if %d3 turns pass without achieving the objective.

TEXT.English: Guns Not Butter[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to train a sizable force of musket units.
TEXT.Chinese: Guns Not Butter[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to train a sizable force of musket units.

TEXT.English: With such a large force of musketmen working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.
TEXT.Chinese: With such a large force of musketmen working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.

TEXT.English: Leverage our military advantage to collect harsh taxes from our feudal lords and their counties.
TEXT.Chinese: Leverage our military advantage to collect harsh taxes from our feudal lords and their counties.

TEXT.English: Enjoy our Golden Age of Muskets.
TEXT.Chinese: Enjoy our Golden Age of Muskets.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Musketman[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassalage[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Musketman[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassalage[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: Issue the new weapons to all of our pikemen.
TEXT.Chinese: Issue the new weapons to all of our pikemen.

TEXT.English: Can we have fries with that? Thanks!
TEXT.Chinese: Can we have fries with that? Thanks!

TEXT.English: Send congratulations to the citizens.
TEXT.Chinese: Send congratulations to the citizens.

TEXT.English: The Harbormaster[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your merchant marine industry to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] for them to become the undisputed trading kings of the sea. You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.
TEXT.Chinese: The Harbormaster[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your merchant marine industry to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] for them to become the undisputed trading kings of the sea. You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.

TEXT.English: Use our advantage to boost the seamanship of our current and future Naval units
TEXT.Chinese: Use our advantage to boost the seamanship of our current and future Naval units

TEXT.English: Our trade empire should be leveraged in to producing lots of wealth.
TEXT.Chinese: Our trade empire should be leveraged in to producing lots of wealth.

TEXT.English: Our ship captains gain extra experience, enabling them to better navigate.
TEXT.Chinese: Our ship captains gain extra experience, enabling them to better navigate.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: Our herbalists have discovered a new plant that holds great promise for health treatments. However, tests on human subjects are required to find the right mixture.
TEXT.Chinese: Our herbalists have discovered a new plant that holds great promise for health treatments. However, tests on human subjects are required to find the right mixture.

TEXT.English: Forget these tests. Anything worth knowing has already been discovered, so why risk needless death?
TEXT.Chinese: Forget these tests. Anything worth knowing has already been discovered, so why risk needless death?

TEXT.English: Alright, try limited tests, but only on non-essential citizens.
TEXT.Chinese: Alright, try limited tests, but only on non-essential citizens.

TEXT.English: Health is the bedrock to world domination! Run full scale tests on all but the youngest and weakest among us.
TEXT.Chinese: Health is the bedrock to world domination! Run full scale tests on all but the youngest and weakest among us.

TEXT.English: In their attempts to find the right mixture of herbs, our healers caused fatalities throughout the empire!
TEXT.Chinese: In their attempts to find the right mixture of herbs, our healers caused fatalities throughout the empire!

TEXT.English: Our experiments have been a success! Our cities now enjoy better healing herbs!
TEXT.Chinese: Our experiments have been a success! Our cities now enjoy better healing herbs!

TEXT.English: Our experiments have been a resounding success! We now posess much better treatments!
TEXT.Chinese: Our experiments have been a resounding success! We now posess much better treatments!

TEXT.English: Suppress the heresy! Then launch a drive to remind our people that we already adhere to the one true faith.
TEXT.Chinese: Suppress the heresy! Then launch a drive to remind our people that we already adhere to the one true faith.

TEXT.English: Tolerate the heresy, yet reward the faithful with reduced taxes for a while, to send a message.
TEXT.Chinese: Tolerate the heresy, yet reward the faithful with reduced taxes for a while, to send a message.

TEXT.English: Ignore the heresy.
TEXT.Chinese: Ignore the heresy.

TEXT.English: No good deed shall go unpunished. Send our recovered soldiers back into battle the moment they are ready.
TEXT.Chinese: No good deed shall go unpunished. Send our recovered soldiers back into battle the moment they are ready.

TEXT.English: Perhaps this is a sign that enough blood has been shed. Send our emissaries to see if they are ready to discuss peace.
TEXT.Chinese: Perhaps this is a sign that enough blood has been shed. Send our emissaries to see if they are ready to discuss peace.

TEXT.English: A heroic gesture of mercy by your forces in regard to %s1_civ_adjective wounded has opened the door to a possible peace treaty. Do you wish to end the war?
TEXT.Chinese: 你的军队对俘获的%s1_civ_adjective伤兵的崇高善意开启了通向和平的大门，你希望结束战争吗？

TEXT.English: A heroic gesture of mercy by the %s3_civ_adjective forces toward the %s1_civ_adjective wounded has brought an unexpected opportunity for peace. The two sides are at least pausing to consider the possibility.
TEXT.Chinese: %s3_civ_adjective军队对俘获的%s1_civ_adjective伤兵的善意举动带来了意外的和平机会，双方已准备进行停火谈判。

TEXT.English: We have no need of his services. Ask him instead to donate his money to the state.
TEXT.Chinese: We have no need of his services. Ask him instead to donate his money to the state.

TEXT.English: Excellent! Have him train Pikeman units for us.
TEXT.Chinese: Excellent! Have him train Pikeman units for us.

TEXT.English: Superb! Have all our military recruits in that city undergo a training regimen at the new academy.
TEXT.Chinese: Superb! Have all our military recruits in that city undergo a training regimen at the new academy.

TEXT.English: Outlaw the use of hydrogen in lighter-than-air vehicles.
TEXT.Chinese: Outlaw the use of hydrogen in lighter-than-air vehicles.

TEXT.English: Fund a drive to regulate air traffic, improve safety and ensure the viability of commercial air travel.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund a drive to regulate air traffic, improve safety and ensure the viability of commercial air travel.

TEXT.English: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.
TEXT.Chinese: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.

TEXT.English: Commit our government to harvesting this new resource immediately.
TEXT.Chinese: Commit our government to harvesting this new resource immediately.

TEXT.English: The Holy Mountain[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your religious leaders to locate, settle near and seize control over the Holy Mountain.
TEXT.Chinese: The Holy Mountain[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your religious leaders to locate, settle near and seize control over the Holy Mountain.

TEXT.English: Your people are inspired by the way in which you have honored your faith.
TEXT.Chinese: Your people are inspired by the way in which you have honored your faith.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must extend your cultural influence and control over the Peak plot that is the Holy Mountain. You may achieve this by divine providence by settling near any Peaks you find. Eventually you may find the right one.[PARAGRAPH:1]Or you may seek further guidance from studying the holy scriptures. If you build %d3 religious buildings (Temples and Monasteries), your religious leaders will solve the puzzle and identify the correct location of the Holy Mountain, which you must then still go and settle near to complete the quest. A %s2_building allows for more coordinated worship and is worth as much as four Temples for the purposes of this quest.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if you change state religions, cease to have a state religion, or reach [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions. You will also fail this quest if any other civilization takes control of the Holy Mountain before you do.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must extend your cultural influence and control over the Peak plot that is the Holy Mountain. You may achieve this by divine providence by settling near any Peaks you find. Eventually you may find the right one.[PARAGRAPH:1]Or you may seek further guidance from studying the holy scriptures. If you build %d3 religious buildings (Temples and Monasteries), your religious leaders will solve the puzzle and identify the correct location of the Holy Mountain, which you must then still go and settle near to complete the quest. A %s2_building allows for more coordinated worship and is worth as much as four Temples for the purposes of this quest.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if you change state religions, cease to have a state religion, or reach [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions. You will also fail this quest if any other civilization takes control of the Holy Mountain before you do.

TEXT.English: Look at the Holy Mountain.
TEXT.Chinese: Look at the Holy Mountain.

TEXT.English: Fill the order!
TEXT.Chinese: Fill the order!

TEXT.English: Horse Whispering[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your elite trainers to build enough stables for them to transcend the traditional limits of animal husbandry.
TEXT.Chinese: Horse Whispering[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your elite trainers to build enough stables for them to transcend the traditional limits of animal husbandry.

TEXT.English: Use our advantage to immediately train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: Use our advantage to immediately train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archers[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Use our existing horses as more effective scouts.
TEXT.Chinese: Use our existing horses as more effective scouts.

TEXT.English: Our horses are trained to be more productive on the farm.
TEXT.Chinese: Our horses are trained to be more productive on the farm.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archers[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: We will utilize the improved shoes for all of our mounted units.
TEXT.Chinese: We will utilize the improved shoes for all of our mounted units.

TEXT.English: We should establish internal trade with the locals for these rare commodities.
TEXT.Chinese: We should establish internal trade with the locals for these rare commodities.

TEXT.English: Fund efforts to increase production without endangering the natural resources that produce them.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund efforts to increase production without endangering the natural resources that produce them.

TEXT.English: Hostile Takeover[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your corporate leaders to obtain (by any means necessary) our own source of all resource types they need to conduct their operations.
TEXT.Chinese: Hostile Takeover[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your corporate leaders to obtain (by any means necessary) our own source of all resource types they need to conduct their operations.

TEXT.English: Cha-ching! Show me the money!
TEXT.Chinese: Cha-ching! Show me the money!

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must settle near uncontrolled resources or attack rival civilizations and take over their resources.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will need to obtain new sources of %d1 [NUM1:resource type:different resource types] (%s2_list_of_resources).[PARAGRAPH:1]You must also retain control over all needed resource types already owned.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization who is also seeking to obtain control over needed resources for one of its corporations should happen to complete this task ahead of you.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must settle near uncontrolled resources or attack rival civilizations and take over their resources.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will need to obtain new sources of %d1 [NUM1:resource type:different resource types] (%s2_list_of_resources).[PARAGRAPH:1]You must also retain control over all needed resource types already owned.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization who is also seeking to obtain control over needed resources for one of its corporations should happen to complete this task ahead of you.

TEXT.English: Buildings have been destroyed.
TEXT.Chinese: Buildings have been destroyed.

TEXT.English: Citizens have been killed.
TEXT.Chinese: Citizens have been killed.

TEXT.English: Please grant an audience to this promising new artist so that we may decide how best to make use of their talents.
TEXT.Chinese: Please grant an audience to this promising new artist so that we may decide how best to make use of their talents.

TEXT.English: We are glad to see that the local culture is thriving.
TEXT.Chinese: We are glad to see that the local culture is thriving.

TEXT.English: This is an endeavor worth pursuing. Fund an effort to master this new art form and incorporate it in to the local culture.
TEXT.Chinese: This is an endeavor worth pursuing. Fund an effort to master this new art form and incorporate it in to the local culture.

TEXT.English: We are pleased at their new choice of residence.
TEXT.Chinese: We are pleased at their new choice of residence.

TEXT.English: Why is this important? Do not bother me with petty details.
TEXT.Chinese: Why is this important? Do not bother me with petty details.

TEXT.English: Commit our government to unlocking the secrets of this mystery.
TEXT.Chinese: Commit our government to unlocking the secrets of this mystery.

TEXT.English: The Congress wants to impeach the President. The population supports this motion.
TEXT.Chinese: The Congress wants to impeach the President. The population supports this motion.

TEXT.English: Then the impeachment should proceed, if that's the people's will.
TEXT.Chinese: Then the impeachment should proceed, if that's the people's will.

TEXT.English: That's an overreaction. The President has gotten the message that his administration needs to improve.
TEXT.Chinese: That's an overreaction. The President has gotten the message that his administration needs to improve.

TEXT.English: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.
TEXT.Chinese: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%F2 in %s3_city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%F2 in %s3_city

TEXT.English: Emphasize improved safety so that this particular type of accident should never happen again.
TEXT.Chinese: Emphasize improved safety so that this particular type of accident should never happen again.

TEXT.English: Fund an emergency rebuilding effort.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund an emergency rebuilding effort.

TEXT.English: Spend whatever is necessary to quarrantine the city.
TEXT.Chinese: Spend whatever is necessary to quarrantine the city.

TEXT.English: If only we had knowledge of Medicine!
TEXT.Chinese: If only we had knowledge of Medicine!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]The virus spreads to some nearby cities and reduces their population by %d1
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]The virus spreads to some nearby cities and reduces their population by %d1

TEXT.English: The Influenza virus has struck %s1_city.
TEXT.Chinese: The Influenza virus has struck %s1_city.

TEXT.English: Our gesture of goodwill toward the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has angered %s6_player.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们对%s1_civ_adjective的善意姿态激怒了%s6_player。

TEXT.English: Word of our interrogation of the fugitive has leaked to %s3_civ_adjective authorities, angering them.
TEXT.Chinese: %s3_civ_adjective政府已获知对我们逃亡者的进行秘密审问，这势必引发外交纠纷。

TEXT.English: We are unable to assist at this time.
TEXT.Chinese: We are unable to assist at this time.

TEXT.English: We can afford a small donation.
TEXT.Chinese: We can afford a small donation.

TEXT.English: We are pleased to provide any assistance they may require!
TEXT.Chinese: We are pleased to provide any assistance they may require!

TEXT.English: Construction will begin as soon as plans are finalized.
TEXT.Chinese: Construction will begin as soon as plans are finalized.

TEXT.English: We can sell the precious jade for additional profit.
TEXT.Chinese: We can sell the precious jade for additional profit.

TEXT.English: People of %s2_city are not feeling safe. They are worried that criminals may escape from the local Jail.
TEXT.Chinese: People of %s2_city are not feeling safe. They are worried that criminals may escape from the local Jail.

TEXT.English: So what? No one is going to escape anyway.
TEXT.Chinese: So what? No one is going to escape anyway.

TEXT.English: Boost jail security and organize a campaign to convince the citizens that they're safe.
TEXT.Chinese: Boost jail security and organize a campaign to convince the citizens that they're safe.

TEXT.English: Send well wishes and a token wedding gift.
TEXT.Chinese: Send well wishes and a token wedding gift.

TEXT.English: Send hearty congratulations and a generous wedding gift.
TEXT.Chinese: Send hearty congratulations and a generous wedding gift.

TEXT.English: Announce a national celebration, send an outlandish wedding gift and donate generously to religious organizations in the name of the newlyweds.
TEXT.Chinese: Announce a national celebration, send an outlandish wedding gift and donate generously to religious organizations in the name of the newlyweds.

TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has drawn no protest from them, and in fact little interest at all. Some family members of the newlyweds are griping but the incident appears to have passed without much bitterness.
TEXT.Chinese: 通过一场%s5_religion_adjective传统婚礼，一位我国显贵和一位%s1_civ_adjective人结为夫妇。他们的行为没有遭到反对，但也没得到关注。尽管两位新人的亲属对此颇有微词，但一切毕竟还算是比较顺利。

TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has drawn a blessing from them with generous wedding gifts. Our people are pleased by this gesture.
TEXT.Chinese: 通过一场%s5_religion_adjective传统婚礼，一位我国显贵和一位%s1_civ_adjective人结为夫妇。有人送上丰厚的礼物以表达对他们的祝福。我们的人民对此表示满意。

TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has been honored by a national holiday, including outlandish wedding gifts and donations to our religious institutions. Our people are thrilled by this gesture.
TEXT.Chinese: 通过一场%s5_religion_adjective传统婚礼，一位我国显贵和一位%s1_civ_adjective人结为夫妇。我们的领袖下令举国欢庆，两位新人获赠了许多珍奇的礼物，还有人为此向我们的宗教机构捐款。

TEXT.English: This should speed our current research.
TEXT.Chinese: This should speed our current research.

TEXT.English: Send condolences to both families and urge them to seek a peaceful resolution to their grievances.
TEXT.Chinese: Send condolences to both families and urge them to seek a peaceful resolution to their grievances.

TEXT.English: Continue to promote reading and writing. Knowledge is power!
TEXT.Chinese: Continue to promote reading and writing. Knowledge is power!

TEXT.English: Begin production of the new fighter.
TEXT.Chinese: Begin production of the new fighter.

TEXT.English: Their problems are none of our affairs. Tell our operatives to stand down.
TEXT.Chinese: Their problems are none of our affairs. Tell our operatives to stand down.

TEXT.English: See that aid reaches those organizing local criminal activity. Be discrete.
TEXT.Chinese: See that aid reaches those organizing local criminal activity. Be discrete.

TEXT.English: Unleash our agents. Allow them to capitalize on any opportunities for mischief-making that they can find.
TEXT.Chinese: Unleash our agents. Allow them to capitalize on any opportunities for mischief-making that they can find.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Between %d1 and %d2 buildings destroyed in %s3_city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Between %d1 and %d2 buildings destroyed in %s3_city

TEXT.English: Our agents have been exposed!
TEXT.Chinese: Our agents have been exposed!

TEXT.English: Civil unrest near %s4_city has led to riots and looting.
TEXT.Chinese: Civil unrest near %s4_city has led to riots and looting.

TEXT.English: Civil unrest near %s4_city has led to riots and looting. Multiple improvements have been destroyed!
TEXT.Chinese: Civil unrest near %s4_city has led to riots and looting. Multiple improvements have been destroyed!

TEXT.English: Massive civil unrest near %s4_city has led to riots and looting. Both inside and outside the city, some of our improvements have been destroyed by looters.
TEXT.Chinese: Massive civil unrest near %s4_city has led to riots and looting. Both inside and outside the city, some of our improvements have been destroyed by looters.

TEXT.English: We have identified %s1_civ_adjective agents who are systematically and actively aggravating the situation in %s4_city!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们发现有%s1_civ_adjective的间谍在暗中参与%s4_city骚乱！

TEXT.English: We have no time for such nonsense. Order them to continue scouting.
TEXT.Chinese: We have no time for such nonsense. Order them to continue scouting.

TEXT.English: This substance must be studied to see how we might make use of it.
TEXT.Chinese: This substance must be studied to see how we might make use of it.

TEXT.English: This heroic deed has inspired our entire army!
TEXT.Chinese: This heroic deed has inspired our entire army!

TEXT.English: The Master Blacksmith[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by the master blacksmith to build enough new [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] to provide acceptable working environments for all the students to whom he intends to pass on his trade secrets.
TEXT.Chinese: The Master Blacksmith[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by the master blacksmith to build enough new [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] to provide acceptable working environments for all the students to whom he intends to pass on his trade secrets.

TEXT.English: Use our advantage to discover a new source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: Use our advantage to discover a new source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Our metalworking empire should be leveraged into producing stronger weaponry.
TEXT.Chinese: Our metalworking empire should be leveraged into producing stronger weaponry.

TEXT.English: The master's best student will be granted control over his forge when he retires, launching a tradition of metalcasting excellence in that city.
TEXT.Chinese: The master's best student will be granted control over his forge when he retires, launching a tradition of metalcasting excellence in that city.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build a total of %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities. This may include Forges already completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]The master smith is a religious man. An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has a state religion if and when the quest is completed successfully.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, if you lose control over %s2_city and the master smith, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build a total of %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities. This may include Forges already completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]The master smith is a religious man. An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has a state religion if and when the quest is completed successfully.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, if you lose control over %s2_city and the master smith, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: We applaud the accomplishments of our revered grand master blacksmith.
TEXT.Chinese: We applaud the accomplishments of our revered grand master blacksmith.

TEXT.English: A great mediator has attempted to broker peace between the %s1_civ_adjective and %s3_adjective Empires!
TEXT.Chinese: 一位中立国领袖提出调停%s1_civ_adjective与%s3_adjective之间的争端，恢复和平！

TEXT.English: Make it so.
TEXT.Chinese: Make it so.

TEXT.English: Organize a rebuilding effort, with emphasis on improved mining safety.
TEXT.Chinese: Organize a rebuilding effort, with emphasis on improved mining safety.

TEXT.English: Send emissaries to assist the bereaved.
TEXT.Chinese: Send emissaries to assist the bereaved.

TEXT.English: We are too pressed to spare any aid for the city.
TEXT.Chinese: We are too pressed to spare any aid for the city.

TEXT.English: The tourism will enhance city revenue.
TEXT.Chinese: The tourism will enhance city revenue.

TEXT.English: We should hire and train some of the pilgrims as missionaries.
TEXT.Chinese: We should hire and train some of the pilgrims as missionaries.

TEXT.English: The Games will be a grand spectacle, with athletes from all nations invited to attend!
TEXT.Chinese: The Games will be a grand spectacle, with athletes from all nations invited to attend!

TEXT.English: These dealings in foreign currency increase the Market's profitability? That is welcome news.
TEXT.Chinese: These dealings in foreign currency increase the Market's profitability? That is welcome news.

TEXT.English: Cash in on our success!
TEXT.Chinese: Cash in on our success!

TEXT.English: Authorize the selling of the improved motor oil on the open market.
TEXT.Chinese: Authorize the selling of the improved motor oil on the open market.

TEXT.English: Fund upgrades to our army's vehicle fleet to make use of the new formula.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund upgrades to our army's vehicle fleet to make use of the new formula.

TEXT.English: Throw support behind the leading general to become the new monarch via coup d'état.
TEXT.Chinese: Throw support behind the leading general to become the new monarch via coup d'état.

TEXT.English: Let the nobles fight amongst themselves. The strongest or cleverest will emerge as the new monarch.
TEXT.Chinese: Let the nobles fight amongst themselves. The strongest or cleverest will emerge as the new monarch.

TEXT.English: Follow the guidance of spiritual leadership in identifying who enjoys divine favor, then support that claimant.
TEXT.Chinese: Follow the guidance of spiritual leadership in identifying who enjoys divine favor, then support that claimant.

TEXT.English: Discovery of naturally occurring glass globules has been ignored by %s1_civ_adjective leadership and will pass in to the dustbin of history.
TEXT.Chinese: Discovery of naturally occurring glass globules has been ignored by %s1_civ_adjective leadership and will pass in to the dustbin of history.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective geologists have discovered a rich source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT] at what turned out to be a very large and ancient impact crater.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的地质学家在一处巨大的远古陨石撞击坑中发现了储量丰富的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铀[COLOR_REVERT]资源。

TEXT.English: Noble Knights[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by the mandate of your people to train a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: Noble Knights[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by the mandate of your people to train a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT] units.

TEXT.English: With such a large force of Knights working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.
TEXT.Chinese: With such a large force of Knights working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.

TEXT.English: Enlist our noble Knights into a drive to spread our faith.
TEXT.Chinese: Enlist our noble Knights into a drive to spread our faith.

TEXT.English: From among our most faithful knights emerges one with holy vision.
TEXT.Chinese: From among our most faithful knights emerges one with holy vision.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Organized Religion[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Organized Religion[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: Our people are protesting against our nuclear arsenal. They fear that we would use nukes with disastrous consequences.
TEXT.Chinese: Our people are protesting against our nuclear arsenal. They fear that we would use nukes with disastrous consequences.

TEXT.English: The people's wishes are our top priority. We will disband our nuclear weapons.
TEXT.Chinese: The people's wishes are our top priority. We will disband our nuclear weapons.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Lose all nuclear weapons.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Lose all nuclear weapons.

TEXT.English: What? Find those who spread such nonsense and prosecute them!
TEXT.Chinese: What? Find those who spread such nonsense and prosecute them!

TEXT.English: We need a positive publicity campaign for our military, right now!
TEXT.Chinese: We need a positive publicity campaign for our military, right now!

TEXT.English: %d1 %s2_civ_adjective [NUM1:building has:buildings have] been destroyed in %s3_city
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_civ_adjective的%s3_city中的%d1座建筑被摧毁。

TEXT.English: The Overwhelm Doctrine[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to construct a fully functional aircraft carrier battle fleet.
TEXT.Chinese: The Overwhelm Doctrine[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to construct a fully functional aircraft carrier battle fleet.

TEXT.English: Take advantage of our momentum to provide additional training for these crews. Prepare them for battle.
TEXT.Chinese: Take advantage of our momentum to provide additional training for these crews. Prepare them for battle.

TEXT.English: Our intent is to keep the peace through strength. Leverage our might in to commercial opportunity.
TEXT.Chinese: Our intent is to keep the peace through strength. Leverage our might in to commercial opportunity.

TEXT.English: Leverage our military advantage to persuade the world to ban nuclear weapons.
TEXT.Chinese: Leverage our military advantage to persuade the world to ban nuclear weapons.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No nuclear weapons.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]No nuclear weapons.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d3 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s4_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d5 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s6_unit[COLOR_REVERT], and %d7 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s8_unit[COLOR_REVERT] units. A source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] will be required to fuel the planes.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization was the one to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s9_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d3 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s4_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d5 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s6_unit[COLOR_REVERT], and %d7 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s8_unit[COLOR_REVERT] units. A source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] will be required to fuel the planes.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization was the one to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s9_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first.

TEXT.English: Parrots make fine pets. We should promote them as one of our trade goods.
TEXT.Chinese: Parrots make fine pets. We should promote them as one of our trade goods.

TEXT.English: Send word to the new partisan units to continue the fight near their destroyed homes.
TEXT.Chinese: Send word to the new partisan units to continue the fight near their destroyed homes.

TEXT.English: Although we will lose up to half their number to exhaustion, desertion and willful refusal to leave the area, we must convince these units to retreat. Have them march to our capital city, where they will reform into units.
TEXT.Chinese: Although we will lose up to half their number to exhaustion, desertion and willful refusal to leave the area, we must convince these units to retreat. Have them march to our capital city, where they will reform into units.

TEXT.English: Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units] near the ruins of the city.
TEXT.Chinese: Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units] near the ruins of the city.

TEXT.English: Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units] in our capital city of %s3_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units] in our capital city of %s3_city.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective citizens from the city we just razed are taking to the surrounding countryside to form Partisan resistance units!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective人民在被毁城市周围的乡村进行游击战，以抗击入侵者。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective citizens from the city we just razed are fleeing toward their capital and are expected to form Partisan resistance units there!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们摧毁的%s1_civ_adjective的市民向他们的首都撤退，并将组织起新的抵抗军！

TEXT.English: Industrious villagers near our city of %s2_city have built a Pasture.
TEXT.Chinese: Industrious villagers near our city of %s2_city have built a Pasture.

TEXT.English: Send them our thanks.
TEXT.Chinese: Send them our thanks.

TEXT.English: Disperse the writing to our researchers so that we may obtain some immediate benefit.
TEXT.Chinese: Disperse the writing to our researchers so that we may obtain some immediate benefit.

TEXT.English: Fund the expansion of the Library to include a new wing housing all of these precious writings.
TEXT.Chinese: Fund the expansion of the Library to include a new wing housing all of these precious writings.

TEXT.English: That's horrible.
TEXT.Chinese: That's horrible.

TEXT.English: Prairie dogs? This is making us money? That's good, I suppose.
TEXT.Chinese: Prairie dogs? This is making us money? That's good, I suppose.

TEXT.English: A scientist from %s2_city has undergone baptism and become a preacher at the city's Christian Monastery.
TEXT.Chinese: A scientist from %s2_city has undergone baptism and become a preacher at the city's Christian Monastery.

TEXT.English: Send the scientist our well wishes.
TEXT.Chinese: Send the scientist our well wishes.

TEXT.English: See if the scientist would be willing to continue the scientific work at the Monastery, given some additional funding.
TEXT.Chinese: See if the scientist would be willing to continue the scientific work at the Monastery, given some additional funding.

TEXT.English: Embrace the Reformation.
TEXT.Chinese: 皈依新教。

TEXT.English: Tolerate the new sects.
TEXT.Chinese: 默许新的教义。

TEXT.English: Join the Counter-Reformation.
TEXT.Chinese: 加入反宗教改革的阵营。

TEXT.English: Your state religion remains Catholic. Protestantism will only spread to some of your larger cities. You will declare war on all civilizations that decided to convert to Protestantism.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的官方信仰仍为天主教。新教只会传播至你的一些较大的城市。你将会向所有皈依新教的国家宣战。

TEXT.English: State religion and most of your cities will change to Protestantism. Catholicism can remain in larger cities. Seizing control of Church assets in Catholic cities is expected to bring %d1 gold to your treasury. If you have founded Protestantism, a shrine will be built in its holy city. Catholic civilizations may declare war on you to stop the Reformation.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的官方信仰及大多数城市的宗教将变为新教。天主教也会在一些大城市中得以保留。没收天主教的教会资产将为你的国库带来%d1金币的收益。如果是你创立了新教，神殿将会在圣城中建立。天主教国家将可能会向你宣战来阻止宗教改革。

TEXT.English: Protestantism can spread to your cities and even replace Catholicism.
TEXT.Chinese: 新教会传播至你的城市，甚至取代天主教。

TEXT.English: Your state religion remains Catholic. Protestantism can spread to your cities and even replace Catholicism.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的官方信仰仍然为天主教。但新教会传播至你的城市，甚至取代天主教。

TEXT.English: Our existing ships can also be refitted? Begin immediately.
TEXT.Chinese: Our existing ships can also be refitted? Begin immediately.

TEXT.English: Do we want stronger cannon? Is that a trick question?
TEXT.Chinese: Do we want stronger cannon? Is that a trick question?

TEXT.English: A rogue radio station in %s2_city is broadcasting propaganda against our ruling party in an amazing display of impudence.
