TEXT.Chinese: A rogue radio station in %s2_city is broadcasting propaganda against our ruling party in an amazing display of impudence.

TEXT.English: Send a blackops group to destroy the radio tower, we can blame it on an industrial accident.
TEXT.Chinese: Send a blackops group to destroy the radio tower, we can blame it on an industrial accident.

TEXT.English: Round up the broadcasters, that should send a message.
TEXT.Chinese: Round up the broadcasters, that should send a message.

TEXT.English: Wait for the station to get more listeners, then round them up along with the broadcasters and send them all to do labour at our factories.
TEXT.Chinese: Wait for the station to get more listeners, then round them up along with the broadcasters and send them all to do labour at our factories.

TEXT.English: We are glad to see that the local culture is thriving.
TEXT.Chinese: We are glad to see that the local culture is thriving.

TEXT.English: We should make this a national holiday!
TEXT.Chinese: We should make this a national holiday!

TEXT.English: This arrangement brings more food to the city? Excellent.
TEXT.Chinese: This arrangement brings more food to the city? Excellent.

TEXT.English: The taxes from these sales should nicely boost our coffers.
TEXT.Chinese: The taxes from these sales should nicely boost our coffers.

TEXT.English: Our ability to manufacture large amounts of gunpowder should prove lucrative.
TEXT.Chinese: Our ability to manufacture large amounts of gunpowder should prove lucrative.

TEXT.English: Saltpeter Discovered.
TEXT.Chinese: Saltpeter Discovered.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] in %d1 additional [NUM1:plot:plots]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] in %d1 additional [NUM1:plot:plots]

TEXT.English: Turtles! What will they think of next?
TEXT.Chinese: Turtles! What will they think of next?

TEXT.English: Hand the material over to our researchers.
TEXT.Chinese: Hand the material over to our researchers.

TEXT.English: Preserve these works as a cultural treasure.
TEXT.Chinese: Preserve these works as a cultural treasure.

TEXT.English: Collect the taxes!
TEXT.Chinese: Collect the taxes!

TEXT.English: Progress sometimes comes more slowly than we would wish.
TEXT.Chinese: Progress sometimes comes more slowly than we would wish.

TEXT.English: Crack down on the rebels. Put down the revolt. Re-establish order.
TEXT.Chinese: 重创叛军。镇压起义。恢复秩序。

TEXT.English: Restore order first, then investigate and redress some of the slaves' grievances.
TEXT.Chinese: Restore order first, then investigate and redress some of the slaves' grievances.

TEXT.English: We are too busy to be bothered. Leave the matter to the local authorities. (Revolt may continue)
TEXT.Chinese: 我们太忙了，把这件事交给地方当局吧。（起义可能仍将继续下去）

TEXT.English: Sir, our slaves are on the verge of revolting! As long as our society continues to use slaves, there is a possibility of them revolting!
TEXT.Chinese: Sir, our slaves are on the verge of revolting! As long as our society continues to use slaves, there is a possibility of them revolting!

TEXT.English: Convert our musketmen to the new gunpowder.
TEXT.Chinese: Convert our musketmen to the new gunpowder.

TEXT.English: This grand achievement has won admiration from people across the globe!
TEXT.Chinese: This grand achievement has won admiration from people across the globe!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] attitude from all leaders
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Receive [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] attitude from all leaders

TEXT.English: Sour crude? What a mess. Less valuable per barrel, but it still burns, right? Just deal with it.
TEXT.Chinese: 劣质原油？真是糟糕，但应该还烧得着吧？允许继续销售。

TEXT.English: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.
TEXT.Chinese: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.

TEXT.English: Commit our government to harvesting this new resource immediately.
TEXT.Chinese: Commit our government to harvesting this new resource immediately.

TEXT.English: That sounds like bad news, but what can we do? Nothing.
TEXT.Chinese: That sounds like bad news, but what can we do? Nothing.

TEXT.English: Pay to have the lost grain replaced.
TEXT.Chinese: Pay to have the lost grain replaced.

TEXT.English: National Sports League[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your cultural advisors to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatres[COLOR_REVERT] to support viable sports leagues.
TEXT.Chinese: “国家体育联合会”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]你的文化顾问提议建造足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]以举办各种体育赛事。

TEXT.English: Use the leagues to make your people happy.
TEXT.Chinese: Use the leagues to make your people happy.

TEXT.English: Leverage these sports leagues in to a cultural tradition.
TEXT.Chinese: Leverage these sports leagues in to a cultural tradition.

TEXT.English: Organize large-scale periodic sporting events in the name of Zeus.
TEXT.Chinese: Organize large-scale periodic sporting events in the name of Zeus.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatres[COLOR_REVERT] in your cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if you control [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] if and when this quest is successfully completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Modern Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这项任务，你必须在本国城市建造%d1座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果在达成目标时你的文明已拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT]，将可以获得一个额外奖励选项。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果其他文明率先达成目标，或者当你进入信息时代时仍未达成目标，你的任务将宣告失败。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective spy is operating on a high level in our government! What should we do?
TEXT.Chinese: 一名%s1_civ_adjective间谍渗入了我国政府高层！我们该如何处理？

TEXT.English: Be discreet. Offer the to release the spy to their government, but question him first.
TEXT.Chinese: Be discreet. Offer the to release the spy to their government, but question him first.

TEXT.English: Every man has his price. His knowledge could make him a very valuable asset.
TEXT.Chinese: Every man has his price. His knowledge could make him a very valuable asset.

TEXT.English: That is an act of war! Clearly, our people and military contractors will rise to the occasion!
TEXT.Chinese: That is an act of war! Clearly, our people and military contractors will rise to the occasion!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Tank:Tanks][COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Tank:Tanks][COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Commission the new fittings for all of our crossbow units.
TEXT.Chinese: Commission the new fittings for all of our crossbow units.

TEXT.English: This is a model for the entire world to follow! Great work.
TEXT.Chinese: This is a model for the entire world to follow! Great work.

TEXT.English: Will offer %d1 gold to %s2 for their cities of %s3. Their refusal will lead to war.
TEXT.Chinese: 为了殖民%s3向%s2提供%d1金币。若他们拒绝则立刻开战。

TEXT.English: Will offer %d1 gold to our colonists to settle %s2.
TEXT.Chinese: 为我们的殖民者提供%d1金币用来殖民%s2。

TEXT.English: Will draft armies to attack %s1 to conquer their cities of %s2.
TEXT.Chinese: 迅速征召军队攻打%s1的城市%s2。

TEXT.English: There are no cities that your armies could conquer.
TEXT.Chinese: 没有城市可供你的军队征服。

TEXT.English: The taxes from these sales should boost our coffers nicely, as well as boosting our relations.
TEXT.Chinese: The taxes from these sales should boost our coffers nicely, as well as boosting our relations.

TEXT.English: Tea exports to %s1_civ_adjective customers have provided a nice boost to our relations.
TEXT.Chinese: 对%s1_civ_adjective的茶叶出口增进了我们之间的关系。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Trading Company has established control over South Asian harbors.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective已经控制了南亚的港口。

TEXT.English: The %1_civ_adjective government supports its Trading Company to achieve military control over its South Asian trade routes!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective政府支持它的贸易公司，以实现对南亚贸易路线的军事控制！

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axeman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axeman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.

TEXT.English: Excellent news. Among other things, this will boost our production of bronze.
TEXT.Chinese: Excellent news. Among other things, this will boost our production of bronze.

TEXT.English: Let the court case take its course, even if the judges seem to split their vote along a purely partisan basis. Follow the constitution to its letter, even though the outcome appears to come down to which party in the dispute had more supporters on the bench.
TEXT.Chinese: Let the court case take its course, even if the judges seem to split their vote along a purely partisan basis. Follow the constitution to its letter, even though the outcome appears to come down to which party in the dispute had more supporters on the bench.

TEXT.English: Refuse to submit to constitutional rule of law, citing wishful reinterpretations of the constitution or arguments based on passion and principle. Arrive at the desired outcome without heed to the actual constitution.
TEXT.Chinese: Refuse to submit to constitutional rule of law, citing wishful reinterpretations of the constitution or arguments based on passion and principle. Arrive at the desired outcome without heed to the actual constitution.

TEXT.English: Do what we can to aid the survivors.
TEXT.Chinese: Do what we can to aid the survivors.

TEXT.English: Issue shields to our troops as supplies permit.
TEXT.Chinese: Issue shields to our troops as supplies permit.

TEXT.English: During the Toxcatl feast, the young man who is Tezcatlipoca's likeness has escaped from the teokalli in %s2_city before he could be sacrificed!
TEXT.Chinese: During the Toxcatl feast, the young man who is Tezcatlipoca's likeness has escaped from the teokalli in %s2_city before he could be sacrificed!

TEXT.English: This is horrible news. May the heavens be merciful...
TEXT.Chinese: This is horrible news. May the heavens be merciful...

TEXT.English: Make every effort to recapture him!
TEXT.Chinese: Make every effort to recapture him!

TEXT.English: Fund the establishment of contracted harbors out of our treasury.
TEXT.Chinese: 从我们的国库中出资建设承包港口。

TEXT.English: Draft an army to establish control.
TEXT.Chinese: 计划建立一支军队。

TEXT.English: This is none of our concern.
TEXT.Chinese: 这与我们无关。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective passenger flight has crashed in our territory near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 一架%s1_civ_adjective客机在我国%s2_city附近坠毁。

TEXT.English: Archaeologists have unearthed a cache of scrolls and stone tablets buried in the desert sands.
TEXT.Chinese: Archaeologists have unearthed a cache of scrolls and stone tablets buried in the desert sands.

TEXT.English: In honor of our gods, the city of %s2_city has organized and hosted a grand series of Games. Athletes from all over the nation travel there to compete.
TEXT.Chinese: In honor of our gods, the city of %s2_city has organized and hosted a grand series of Games. Athletes from all over the nation travel there to compete.

TEXT.English: Rumors that a spirit angel of mercy is watching over the patients in the hospital in %s2_city are leading many devout believers to seek treatment there.
TEXT.Chinese: Rumors that a spirit angel of mercy is watching over the patients in the hospital in %s2_city are leading many devout believers to seek treatment there.

TEXT.English: With removal by man of natural predators, the antelope population has grown large enough to serve as a sustained food source.
TEXT.Chinese: With removal by man of natural predators, the antelope population has grown large enough to serve as a sustained food source.

TEXT.English: A passionate young man has undertaken a crusade to plant as many new apple trees as he can.
TEXT.Chinese: A passionate young man has undertaken a crusade to plant as many new apple trees as he can.

TEXT.English: Soldiers from our victorious %s3_unit have rallied behind their combat heroes! Their strength and resolve have firmed! Their proficiency has increased!
TEXT.Chinese: Soldiers from our victorious %s3_unit have rallied behind their combat heroes! Their strength and resolve have firmed! Their proficiency has increased!

TEXT.English: Our craftsmen have devised a technique for improving the balance of our axes.
TEXT.Chinese: Our craftsmen have devised a technique for improving the balance of our axes.

TEXT.English: Our soldiers, returning from war, have dedicated themselves to peace and to raising families. Our civilization is experiencing a baby boom!
TEXT.Chinese: Our soldiers, returning from war, have dedicated themselves to peace and to raising families. Our civilization is experiencing a baby boom!

TEXT.English: One of our ice cream parlors has invented the banana split.
TEXT.Chinese: One of our ice cream parlors has invented the banana split.

TEXT.English: A songwriter from %s2_city has composed a heartrending ballad, which is growing in popularity amongst the people there.
TEXT.Chinese: A songwriter from %s2_city has composed a heartrending ballad, which is growing in popularity amongst the people there.

TEXT.English: On a sunny day, with no storms in sight, one of our vessels has been lost at sea. Not only is the cause unknown, but there is no trace whatsoever of the ship or its crew or cargo. Several smaller vessels and some airplanes in the same general region also have vanished without a trace. Rumors are flying concerning this mystery. This region has been dubbed by the press as the Bermuda Triangle, named after a small island nearby.
TEXT.Chinese: On a sunny day, with no storms in sight, one of our vessels has been lost at sea. Not only is the cause unknown, but there is no trace whatsoever of the ship or its crew or cargo. Several smaller vessels and some airplanes in the same general region also have vanished without a trace. Rumors are flying concerning this mystery. This region has been dubbed by the press as the Bermuda Triangle, named after a small island nearby.

TEXT.English: Our generals request government aid in expanding our fortifications.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] to satisfy their views on mounting a proper defense for our nation.
TEXT.Chinese: Our generals request government aid in expanding our fortifications.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] to satisfy their views on mounting a proper defense for our nation.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your military planners and built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] to serve as fortresses against invaders. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your defense is able to provide to you.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your military planners and built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] to serve as fortresses against invaders. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your defense is able to provide to you.

TEXT.English: Locals have figured out a way to obtain a higher yield of black pearls. They are guarding their secret with great care.
TEXT.Chinese: Locals have figured out a way to obtain a higher yield of black pearls. They are guarding their secret with great care.

TEXT.English: Our spiritual leaders are urging us to seek the blessings of the sea![PARAGRAPH:1]The wise masters have divined the way regarding our relationship with the sea. They urge us to embrace the sea, to broaden our influence over it and spread our traditions to new lands.
TEXT.Chinese: Our spiritual leaders are urging us to seek the blessings of the sea![PARAGRAPH:1]The wise masters have divined the way regarding our relationship with the sea. They urge us to embrace the sea, to broaden our influence over it and spread our traditions to new lands.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your religious masters and spread your civilization across the waters. You have completed the quest of The Blessed Sea.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your religious masters and spread your civilization across the waters. You have completed the quest of The Blessed Sea.

TEXT.English: A blizzard has dumped several meters of snow on a region near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: A blizzard has dumped several meters of snow on a region near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Massive snowfall has buried a region of our territory near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Massive snowfall has buried a region of our territory near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A new design of steel boiler is in demand, because it can raise manufacturing productivity.
TEXT.Chinese: A new design of steel boiler is in demand, because it can raise manufacturing productivity.

TEXT.English: A master bowyer has crafted a bow design that works particularly well with our native wood.
TEXT.Chinese: A master bowyer has crafted a bow design that works particularly well with our native wood.

TEXT.English: Our researchers have made a technological breakthrough, rapidly advancing their progress.
TEXT.Chinese: Our researchers have made a technological breakthrough, rapidly advancing their progress.

TEXT.English: Our brothers in the true %s4_religion_adjective faith who dwell in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire are at war. They lack for vital strategic resources that we have in abundance. This is our chance to come to their aid!
TEXT.Chinese: 与我们一样信奉%s4_religion_adjective的%s1_civ_adjective兄弟正处于战争状态。而我们拥有他们所缺乏的重要战略资源，这是我们提供帮助的机会！

TEXT.English: A careless apprentice started a fire at the Forge in %s2_city, during which the facility was destroyed.
TEXT.Chinese: A careless apprentice started a fire at the Forge in %s2_city, during which the facility was destroyed.

TEXT.English: Brush fires sparked by dry conditions near %s2_city spread to the trade district. The Forge was burned down.
TEXT.Chinese: Brush fires sparked by dry conditions near %s2_city spread to the trade district. The Forge was burned down.

TEXT.English: Unknown arsonists have torched the Forge in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Unknown arsonists have torched the Forge in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Our military leaders have held internal war games to strengthen our training and grit. One unit has emerged as the champion.
TEXT.Chinese: Our military leaders have held internal war games to strengthen our training and grit. One unit has emerged as the champion.

TEXT.English: A stronger, more charismatic dictator has seized control of the Party and the nation!
TEXT.Chinese: A stronger, more charismatic dictator has seized control of the Party and the nation!

TEXT.English: A pilot from %s2_city has become the first to fly solo over the North Pole and return safely.
TEXT.Chinese: A pilot from %s2_city has become the first to fly solo over the North Pole and return safely.

TEXT.English: A careless cigarette smoker started a fire at the Theatre in %s2_city, during which the building was destroyed and numerous patrons died.
TEXT.Chinese: A careless cigarette smoker started a fire at the Theatre in %s2_city, during which the building was destroyed and numerous patrons died.

TEXT.English: An accident on stage at the Theatre in %s2_city started a fire that burned down the building. Most of the audience escaped alive, thank goodness.
TEXT.Chinese: An accident on stage at the Theatre in %s2_city started a fire that burned down the building. Most of the audience escaped alive, thank goodness.

TEXT.English: Scouts exploring ruins near %s2_city have discovered a cache of knowledge.
TEXT.Chinese: Scouts exploring ruins near %s2_city have discovered a cache of knowledge.

TEXT.English: An archaeological expedition to city ruins near %s2_city has uncovered lost treasures, texts and artifacts.
TEXT.Chinese: An archaeological expedition to city ruins near %s2_city has uncovered lost treasures, texts and artifacts.

TEXT.English: Our game designers have developed a new addictive game of Civilization. How shall we proceed?
TEXT.Chinese: Our game designers have developed a new addictive game of Civilization. How shall we proceed?

TEXT.English: Our eldest scholars have collaborated on an effort to collect, record, and preserve all of our oral traditions and unwritten literature.[PARAGRAPH:1]They require storage space for pottery, stone tablets and other artifacts, as well as special repositories within our cities.
TEXT.Chinese: Our eldest scholars have collaborated on an effort to collect, record, and preserve all of our oral traditions and unwritten literature.[PARAGRAPH:1]They require storage space for pottery, stone tablets and other artifacts, as well as special repositories within our cities.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your scholars and built for them enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] to store their newly recorded works. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new treasure trove of written literature are able to provide to you.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your scholars and built for them enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] to store their newly recorded works. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new treasure trove of written literature are able to provide to you.

TEXT.English: Most of the coal being mined from one of our sites is thick with rock, shale, and other impurities. We are stuck with a source of clunker coal!
TEXT.Chinese: Most of the coal being mined from one of our sites is thick with rock, shale, and other impurities. We are stuck with a source of clunker coal!

TEXT.English: A comet fragment has crashed to earth in a remote tundra region, obliterating an entire forest and speeding the earth's rotation by two seconds.
TEXT.Chinese: A comet fragment has crashed to earth in a remote tundra region, obliterating an entire forest and speeding the earth's rotation by two seconds.

TEXT.English: The Chief Executive Officer of %s11_corporation seeks government incentives to better enable his company to expand.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we can assist in spreading his corporation to new cities, profits will skyrocket.
TEXT.Chinese: The Chief Executive Officer of %s11_corporation seeks government incentives to better enable his company to expand.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we can assist in spreading his corporation to new cities, profits will skyrocket.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion and enabled %s11_corporation to turn extra profit.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion and enabled %s11_corporation to turn extra profit.

TEXT.English: Crab cakes prepared in our cities have become enormously popular across the region.
TEXT.Chinese: Crab cakes prepared in our cities have become enormously popular across the region.

TEXT.English: The eldest senator of the leading opposition party has been disgraced by scandal. The entire senate has been thrown into chaos.
TEXT.Chinese: The eldest senator of the leading opposition party has been disgraced by scandal. The entire senate has been thrown into chaos.

TEXT.English: Our war against the %s1:2_civ_adjective continues. Our spiritual leaders cry out for us to wage a crusade to wrest control of %s6_city away from them.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们与%s1:2_civ_adjective的战争仍在继续，最高精神领袖号召发动圣战，从敌人手中夺取圣城%s6_city。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! Your Crusade to secure the sacred lands of %s2_city has wrested control of the city away from the %s1:2_civ_adjective! Please choose a reward from among the benefits that may accrue from the joy your people feel in this successful Crusade.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你！你的军队从%s1:2_civ_adjective异教徒手中夺取了圣城%s2_city！这场胜利使人民感到欢欣鼓舞，请在赢得圣战可带来的奖励中选择一项。

TEXT.English: A powerful cyclone originating in the southern hemisphere has made landfall at %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: A powerful cyclone originating in the southern hemisphere has made landfall at %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Excessive tilling of the soil on the open plains has caused massive wind erosion and created a dustbowl effect, complete with dust storms.
TEXT.Chinese: Excessive tilling of the soil on the open plains has caused massive wind erosion and created a dustbowl effect, complete with dust storms.

TEXT.English: The dustbowl effect continues. Another of our Farms has been wiped out by soil loss and by farmers abandoning their steads.
TEXT.Chinese: The dustbowl effect continues. Another of our Farms has been wiped out by soil loss and by farmers abandoning their steads.

TEXT.English: Our government announces the first annual Earth Day to raise awareness of all environmental issues among the populace.
TEXT.Chinese: Our government announces the first annual Earth Day to raise awareness of all environmental issues among the populace.

TEXT.English: The workers for our electric companies are so happy and well motivated, they repair damaged lines quickly no matter the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: The workers for our electric companies are so happy and well motivated, they repair damaged lines quickly no matter the conditions.

TEXT.English: Our military commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to rout our enemies on the field of battle!
TEXT.Chinese: Our military commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to rout our enemies on the field of battle!

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.

TEXT.English: A prolific playwright from %s2_city has written a long series of exceptionally popular plays. His home theatre has gained renown.
TEXT.Chinese: A prolific playwright from %s2_city has written a long series of exceptionally popular plays. His home theatre has gained renown.

TEXT.English: A retiring captain from one of our most elite naval vessels has pledged his wisdom and abilities toward shipbuilding at the drydock in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: A retiring captain from one of our most elite naval vessels has pledged his wisdom and abilities toward shipbuilding at the drydock in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A dreadful harvest for our %s1_civ_adjective neighbors in the city of %s6_city just across the border has left its people starving. We may have a chance to gain favor with them if we provide humanitarian assistance from %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 靠近我国边境的%s1_civ_adjective的%s6_city粮食严重歉收，人民陷入饥荒。如果%s2_city能够提供一批人道主义援助，他们将非常感激。

TEXT.English: Famine has struck the city of %s6_city. Our people in %s2_city have enough food on hand to assist their %s1_civ_adjective neighbors. We stand ready to provide aid and comfort.
TEXT.Chinese: %s6_city发生了严重饥荒。我国的%s2_city的居民有足够的粮食储备来为他们的%s1_civ_adjective邻居提供援助。我们已做好了提供救援的准备。

TEXT.English: Tragedy has struck just beyond your border, as the %s1_civ_adjective Empire struggles to feed all its hungry people in %s6_city. Many will die without enough to eat. Should the citizens of %s2_city move to assist them?
TEXT.Chinese: Tragedy has struck just beyond your border, as the %s1_civ_adjective Empire struggles to feed all its hungry people in %s6_city. Many will die without enough to eat. Should the citizens of %s2_city move to assist them?

TEXT.English: Farmers outside %s2_city are complaining of bandits robbing them regularly.
TEXT.Chinese: Farmers outside %s2_city are complaining of bandits robbing them regularly.

TEXT.English: Criminal activity has disrupted food production in a farming region outside %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Criminal activity has disrupted food production in a farming region outside %s2_city.

TEXT.English: We may need to take action against thieves in %s2_city who are preying upon our farmers.
TEXT.Chinese: We may need to take action against thieves in %s2_city who are preying upon our farmers.

TEXT.English: The local authorities of %s2_city are still struggling to control the bandit activity plaguing our farmers.
TEXT.Chinese: The local authorities of %s2_city are still struggling to control the bandit activity plaguing our farmers.

TEXT.English: Criminals are still preying on our farmers. A more stringent response may be necessary in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Criminals are still preying on our farmers. A more stringent response may be necessary in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A new plow design has become popular. Our Forges have filled orders for the new plows from farmers across our lands.
TEXT.Chinese: A new plow design has become popular. Our Forges have filled orders for the new plows from farmers across our lands.

TEXT.English: Silk dresses have become the latest fashion, sweeping the nation thanks to radio advertising.
TEXT.Chinese: Silk dresses have become the latest fashion, sweeping the nation thanks to radio advertising.

TEXT.English: Our ambassador to the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has committed a faux pas!
TEXT.Chinese: 我国驻%s1_civ_adjective大使发生失礼行为！

TEXT.English: A gladiator from %s2_city has survived many battles in the arena. He is attracting a lot of fans.
TEXT.Chinese: A gladiator from %s2_city has survived many battles in the arena. He is attracting a lot of fans.

TEXT.English: Our economists have devised a system of regulating interest rates to help normalize economic growth.
TEXT.Chinese: Our economists have devised a system of regulating interest rates to help normalize economic growth.

TEXT.English: A master smith has devised a firing pin for our grenades, ending the need to use fuses.
TEXT.Chinese: A master smith has devised a firing pin for our grenades, ending the need to use fuses.

TEXT.English: A forest fire sparked by lightning has raged across the land near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: A forest fire sparked by lightning has raged across the land near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Criminals have set fire to the forest near %s2_city in a failed bid to aid their escape from justice.
TEXT.Chinese: Criminals have set fire to the forest near %s2_city in a failed bid to aid their escape from justice.

TEXT.English: Tragedy has struck near %s2_city as a village fire spread to the forest, scarring the land for miles.
TEXT.Chinese: Tragedy has struck near %s2_city as a village fire spread to the forest, scarring the land for miles.

TEXT.English: The legend of Forty Thieves has attracted treasure hunters and tourists to the area, boosting local commerce.
TEXT.Chinese: The legend of Forty Thieves has attracted treasure hunters and tourists to the area, boosting local commerce.

TEXT.English: Musical artists from across our nation have gathered in %s2_city to raise money and awareness for the cause of religious freedom.
TEXT.Chinese: Musical artists from across our nation have gathered in %s2_city to raise money and awareness for the cause of religious freedom.

TEXT.English: A small tribe of friendly locals have granted sanctuary to our beleaguered %s3_unit.
TEXT.Chinese: A small tribe of friendly locals have granted sanctuary to our beleaguered %s3_unit.

TEXT.English: The mass transit system in %s2_city has implemented a city-wide program of using fuel additives to reduce pollution and improve on maintenance costs and fuel efficiency.
TEXT.Chinese: The mass transit system in %s2_city has implemented a city-wide program of using fuel additives to reduce pollution and improve on maintenance costs and fuel efficiency.

TEXT.English: A fugitive from justice, wanted for crimes in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire, has been discovered hiding out in our territory.
TEXT.Chinese: 一名遭%s1_civ_adjective政府通缉的逃犯被发现正隐藏于我国境内。

TEXT.English: An assassin wanted for slaying a %s1_civ_adjective official has been caught fleeing through our land.
TEXT.Chinese: 一名因暗杀%s1_civ_adjective官员而遭该国政府通缉的刺客在我国境内被抓获。

TEXT.English: Jewelers have successfully launched a tradition of the diamond ring as the gift of choice for wedding proposals.
TEXT.Chinese: Jewelers have successfully launched a tradition of the diamond ring as the gift of choice for wedding proposals.

TEXT.English: Small amounts of gold panned from streams have sparked a gold rush to the area by immigrants looking to strike it rich.
TEXT.Chinese: Small amounts of gold panned from streams have sparked a gold rush to the area by immigrants looking to strike it rich.

TEXT.English: Prospectors have successfully mined newly discovered veins of gold near %s2_city. The news has produced a gold rush.
TEXT.Chinese: Prospectors have successfully mined newly discovered veins of gold near %s2_city. The news has produced a gold rush.

TEXT.English: Corporate fraud within our own [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s11_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] has collapsed the company's stock price, taking the rest of the market down with it and triggering a global economic depression.
TEXT.Chinese: Corporate fraud within our own [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s11_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] has collapsed the company's stock price, taking the rest of the market down with it and triggering a global economic depression.

TEXT.English: A great mediator has emerged, offering to arbitrate the dispute between %s1_civ_adjective leadership and our nation. This could be a chance for peace.
TEXT.Chinese: A great mediator has emerged, offering to arbitrate the dispute between %s1_civ_adjective leadership and our nation. This could be a chance for peace.

TEXT.English: Our generals covet a source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] that lies within %s1_civ_adjective borders. Without it, we cannot properly train and equip our troops!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的将军垂涎于%s1_civ_adjective境内的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT]资源。由于缺乏这种资源，我们无法更有效地训练和装备部队！

TEXT.English: Congratulations! Your Greed is unmatched! You have managed to wrest control of the coveted %s1_civ_adjective [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] resource! Your generals are already expanding their military planning.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你！你贪婪的欲望得到了满足！你夺取了%s1_civ_adjective的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT]资源！你的将军们已经开始研究扩军方案！

TEXT.English: Our generals request that we focus on making guns. These are the weapons of the future![PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to command any battlefield.
TEXT.Chinese: Our generals request that we focus on making guns. These are the weapons of the future![PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to command any battlefield.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of musket units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of musket units. Please choose your reward.

TEXT.English: Our weapon masters have devised a halberd design that remains fully effective versus mounted units but will boost effectiveness versus foot soldiers.
TEXT.Chinese: Our weapon masters have devised a halberd design that remains fully effective versus mounted units but will boost effectiveness versus foot soldiers.

TEXT.English: A new type of rapid-service restaurant selling primarily hamburgers was launched recently. Thanks to successful radio advertising, the chain is now expanding across the nation.
TEXT.Chinese: A new type of rapid-service restaurant selling primarily hamburgers was launched recently. Thanks to successful radio advertising, the chain is now expanding across the nation.

TEXT.English: Moose herds near %s2_city have grown particularly large. Our hunters have harvested a cache of surplus food.
TEXT.Chinese: Moose herds near %s2_city have grown particularly large. Our hunters have harvested a cache of surplus food.

TEXT.English: The people of %s2_city celebrate as the latest caribou hunting season has brought a rich harvest.
TEXT.Chinese: The people of %s2_city celebrate as the latest caribou hunting season has brought a rich harvest.

TEXT.English: Deer proliferate through the forest near %s2_city, allowing our hunters to store up extra meat.
TEXT.Chinese: Deer proliferate through the forest near %s2_city, allowing our hunters to store up extra meat.

TEXT.English: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.
TEXT.Chinese: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your merchant marine and built for them enough ships and docks to empower their plans. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new trading empire is able to provide to you.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your merchant marine and built for them enough ships and docks to empower their plans. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new trading empire is able to provide to you.

TEXT.English: A heretical spiritual movement has started in %s2_city and is gaining strength among some sections of our populace.
TEXT.Chinese: A heretical spiritual movement has started in %s2_city and is gaining strength among some sections of our populace.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective forces have unexpectedly shown mercy and compassion for our wounded, tending them on the battlefield and then returning the survivors safely to us.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective军队对俘获的我国伤兵显示了出乎意料的仁慈，为他们提供救助并安全送还我方。

TEXT.English: An esteemed warlord who operates from the castle in %s2_city has offered to set up a special military academy at his own expense.
TEXT.Chinese: An esteemed warlord who operates from the castle in %s2_city has offered to set up a special military academy at his own expense.

TEXT.English: Reckless merchants used hydrogen instead of helium to fill their dirigibles and one has caught fire and crashed in a spectacularly fatal accident.
TEXT.Chinese: Reckless merchants used hydrogen instead of helium to fill their dirigibles and one has caught fire and crashed in a spectacularly fatal accident.

TEXT.English: Prospectors have discovered rich new veins of Silver ore.
TEXT.Chinese: Prospectors have discovered rich new veins of Silver ore.

TEXT.English: Our religious leaders believe our people can earn the blessings of the deity if we can reclaim the Holy Mountain![PARAGRAPH:1]They have studied the scriptures with an eye toward locating the holy mountain. They have so far not found it anywhere within our lands and believe that it must lie elsewhere. More study will be needed if we are to identify the sacred location.
TEXT.Chinese: Our religious leaders believe our people can earn the blessings of the deity if we can reclaim the Holy Mountain![PARAGRAPH:1]They have studied the scriptures with an eye toward locating the holy mountain. They have so far not found it anywhere within our lands and believe that it must lie elsewhere. More study will be needed if we are to identify the sacred location.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have located the Holy Mountain and extended your cultural influence over the sacred site!
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have located the Holy Mountain and extended your cultural influence over the sacred site!

TEXT.English: You have built enough religious buildings for your religious leaders to solve the puzzle and identify the correct location of the Holy Mountain. Settle near that location to complete the quest!
TEXT.Chinese: You have built enough religious buildings for your religious leaders to solve the puzzle and identify the correct location of the Holy Mountain. Settle near that location to complete the quest!

TEXT.English: The high priest of the temple in %s2_city has placed a large order for our domestically produced incense for use in holy rituals.
TEXT.Chinese: The high priest of the temple in %s2_city has placed a large order for our domestically produced incense for use in holy rituals.

TEXT.English: Our horse trainers believe that it would be possible to gain a much deeper bond with and understanding of our riding animals.[PARAGRAPH:1]They require a larger and more coordinated network of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] to pursue this goal.
TEXT.Chinese: Our horse trainers believe that it would be possible to gain a much deeper bond with and understanding of our riding animals.[PARAGRAPH:1]They require a larger and more coordinated network of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] to pursue this goal.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your horse trainers and built for them enough facilities to empower their plans. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your horse trainers are able to provide to you.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your horse trainers and built for them enough facilities to empower their plans. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your horse trainers are able to provide to you.

TEXT.English: A brilliant smith has developed significant innovation in the design of horseshoes.
TEXT.Chinese: A brilliant smith has developed significant innovation in the design of horseshoes.

TEXT.English: Herbalists have discovered rare and precious plants that grow in abundance only in a certain region near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Herbalists have discovered rare and precious plants that grow in abundance only in a certain region near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A medicinal tea cultivated by locals has been found to be effective with treating illnesses. This tea grows only in a specific region near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: A medicinal tea cultivated by locals has been found to be effective with treating illnesses. This tea grows only in a specific region near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Certain rare insects found near %s2_city, when harvested and ground into a paste by a reclusive tribe, can be ingested to reduce fever.
TEXT.Chinese: Certain rare insects found near %s2_city, when harvested and ground into a paste by a reclusive tribe, can be ingested to reduce fever.

TEXT.English: The Chief Executive Officer of %s11_corporation covets getting out from under the thumb of foreign suppliers of raw materials.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we can obtain control over all resource types his corporation needs for industrial use, their profits will skyrocket.
TEXT.Chinese: The Chief Executive Officer of %s11_corporation covets getting out from under the thumb of foreign suppliers of raw materials.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we can obtain control over all resource types his corporation needs for industrial use, their profits will skyrocket.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have completed the quest of Hostile Takeover and enabled %s11_corporation to turn extra profit.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have completed the quest of Hostile Takeover and enabled %s11_corporation to turn extra profit.

TEXT.English: A powerful hurricane has made a direct hit on %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: A powerful hurricane has made a direct hit on %s2_city.

TEXT.English: The music played in your %s5_building in %s2_city has inspired a young person, who has grown into a Great Artist!
TEXT.Chinese: The music played in your %s5_building in %s2_city has inspired a young person, who has grown into a Great Artist!

TEXT.English: The art and sculpture decorating the %s5_building in %s2_city has nurtured the imagination and talents of a new Great Artist!
TEXT.Chinese: The art and sculpture decorating the %s5_building in %s2_city has nurtured the imagination and talents of a new Great Artist!

TEXT.English: An artist in the frozen tundra near %s2_city has perfected a means of crafting beautiful ice sculptures.
TEXT.Chinese: An artist in the frozen tundra near %s2_city has perfected a means of crafting beautiful ice sculptures.

TEXT.English: Immigrants are flowing to %s2_city inspired by stories of its culture!
TEXT.Chinese: Immigrants are flowing to %s2_city inspired by stories of its culture!

TEXT.English: Researchers have discovered a large incidence of naturally formed glass globules in an area around a wide circular valley.
TEXT.Chinese: Researchers have discovered a large incidence of naturally formed glass globules in an area around a wide circular valley.

TEXT.English: A community of independent film producers based in %s2_city has managed to secure a slice of the Hit Movies market.
TEXT.Chinese: A community of independent film producers based in %s2_city has managed to secure a slice of the Hit Movies market.

TEXT.English: A fire at the Factory in %s2_city, which was started by a worker's mistake, has gutted the building.
TEXT.Chinese: A fire at the Factory in %s2_city, which was started by a worker's mistake, has gutted the building.

TEXT.English: An influenza epidemic has struck hard at the people of %s2_city. Most have fallen ill and many are dying.
TEXT.Chinese: An influenza epidemic has struck hard at the people of %s2_city. Most have fallen ill and many are dying.

TEXT.English: Inspired %s4_religion_adjective missionaries have spread their influence out of %s2_city. They now seek an audience with you, requesting your assistance in funding additional missions to the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 热忱的%s4_religion_adjective传教士努力将他们的信仰传播到%s2_city以外的地方。他们请求你的接见，希望您资助他在全%s1_civ_adjective的传教活动。

TEXT.English: Our engineers have conceived a national highway system of divided highways free of all traffic stops, built in straight lines on smooth grades.
TEXT.Chinese: Our engineers have conceived a national highway system of divided highways free of all traffic stops, built in straight lines on smooth grades.

TEXT.English: A rich source of jade has been found amongst the veins of iron at one of our mines.
TEXT.Chinese: A rich source of jade has been found amongst the veins of iron at one of our mines.

TEXT.English: Two prominent families, one from our people and one from the %s1_civ_adjective people, have forged an alliance through an arranged %s4_religion_adjective marriage.
TEXT.Chinese: 两个显赫的家族，一个来自我国，另一个来自%s1_civ_adjective，通过一场%s4_religion_adjective传统婚礼结成了亲家。

TEXT.English: One of our prominent young noble ladies has fallen in love with a %s1_civ_adjective nobleman and they are to be wed in the %s4_religion_adjective tradition.
TEXT.Chinese: 我国一位家世显赫的年轻贵族小姐爱上了一位%s1_civ_adjective贵族，他们将按%s4_religion_adjective传统举行婚礼。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective industrial heiress has received a marriage proposal from one of our prominent business tycoons. Their %s4_religion_adjective wedding will occur this year.
TEXT.Chinese: 我国一位显赫的商业大亨已向一家%s1_civ_adjective公司的女继承人求婚。他们遵照%s4_religion_adjective传统的婚礼将在今年举行。

TEXT.English: A scientific breakthrough has occurred at the Laboratory in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: A scientific breakthrough has occurred at the Laboratory in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A politically arranged marriage between one of our noblemen and a woman from a noble %s1_civ_adjective family has collapsed into feuding as the groom backed out of the wedding on the wedding day.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位我国贵族和一位%s1_civ_adjective世家女的政治联姻演最终变成了激烈的国际冲突――因为新郎在结婚当日取消了婚礼。

TEXT.English: Two prominent families, one from our people and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire, are feuding over their children. A groom, from our family, jilted his would-be bride by walking his cold feet right on out of the temple, insulting and outraging his would-be inlaws.
TEXT.Chinese: Two prominent families, one from our people and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire, are feuding over their children. A groom, from our family, jilted his would-be bride by walking his cold feet right on out of the temple, insulting and outraging his would-be inlaws.

TEXT.English: An %s1_civ_adjective industrial heiress has been left at the altar by one of our prominent business tycoons, who had proposed marriage to her. The fiasco has outraged the families on both sides, who are now feuding over the collapsed marriage.
TEXT.Chinese: 一家%s1_civ_adjective企业的女继承人被一位向她求婚的我国商业大亨抛弃在婚礼的圣坛上。这场可怕的意外使双方家族都非常愤怒，不断彼此指责。

TEXT.English: Our citizenry enjoys virtually universal literacy. This achievement is bound to pay off in unexpected ways.
TEXT.Chinese: Our citizenry enjoys virtually universal literacy. This achievement is bound to pay off in unexpected ways.

TEXT.English: Our engineers have developed an advanced fighter design that is lighter and carries slightly more fuel, extending its operational range.
TEXT.Chinese: Our engineers have developed an advanced fighter design that is lighter and carries slightly more fuel, extending its operational range.

TEXT.English: There is civil unrest near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s6_city. Our scouts in the area tell us there may be an opportunity to aggravate the situation.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s6_city周边的局势已经失控。我们派往该处的间谍提议乘机采取行动。

TEXT.English: There are riots taking place near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s6_city. Our agents stand ready to add fuel to these fires, to stir up additional trouble.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s6_city附近发生骚乱。我们派往该处的间谍提议火上浇油，制造更大的麻烦。

TEXT.English: While hunting, our %s3_unit has discovered a rich supply of a black oil that burns rather hot.
TEXT.Chinese: While hunting, our %s3_unit has discovered a rich supply of a black oil that burns rather hot.

TEXT.English: A brave and hardy soldier has run over twenty-six miles on foot to warn of the invasion!
TEXT.Chinese: A brave and hardy soldier has run over twenty-six miles on foot to warn of the invasion!

TEXT.English: Local officials in %s2_city have ordered a large number of marble statues to adorn their public buildings and their forum.
TEXT.Chinese: Local officials in %s2_city have ordered a large number of marble statues to adorn their public buildings and their forum.

TEXT.English: The master blacksmith in %s2_city has offered to take on and train multiple apprentices if the government will build new forges for them to operate once their training has been completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities to accommodate the master's new students.
TEXT.Chinese: The master blacksmith in %s2_city has offered to take on and train multiple apprentices if the government will build new forges for them to operate once their training has been completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities to accommodate the master's new students.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your master blacksmith and built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] for each for his students to have his own to operate. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new metalworking empire is able to provide to you.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your master blacksmith and built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] for each for his students to have his own to operate. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new metalworking empire is able to provide to you.

TEXT.English: %s2_city has produced a grand master blacksmith who has overseen the expansion and upgrade of the Forge to increase its efficiency.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city has produced a grand master blacksmith who has overseen the expansion and upgrade of the Forge to increase its efficiency.

TEXT.English: Our shipmasters have concluded that switching to steel decks on our carriers instead of wooden decks would be to our advantage.
TEXT.Chinese: Our shipmasters have concluded that switching to steel decks on our carriers instead of wooden decks would be to our advantage.

TEXT.English: A minor earthquake near %s2_city has caused the collapse of a nearby mine. Trapped miners have perished by the hundreds.
TEXT.Chinese: A minor earthquake near %s2_city has caused the collapse of a nearby mine. Trapped miners have perished by the hundreds.

TEXT.English: A massive explosion has destroyed one of our mines. The cause is unknown, but hundreds are dead.
TEXT.Chinese: A massive explosion has destroyed one of our mines. The cause is unknown, but hundreds are dead.

TEXT.English: Tragedy has struck near %s2_city as poisonous gases filled a mine and struck down most of the miners who were inside.
TEXT.Chinese: Tragedy has struck near %s2_city as poisonous gases filled a mine and struck down most of the miners who were inside.

TEXT.English: A miracle is believed to have occurred at the city wall in %s2_city. Pilgrims are flocking from all over to visit the new holy site.
TEXT.Chinese: A miracle is believed to have occurred at the city wall in %s2_city. Pilgrims are flocking from all over to visit the new holy site.

TEXT.English: In the spirit of international cooperation, the city of %s2_city has decided to revive its ancient tradition of the Games, forming this in to a world event.
TEXT.Chinese: In the spirit of international cooperation, the city of %s2_city has decided to revive its ancient tradition of the Games, forming this in to a world event.

TEXT.English: The Market in %s2_city has attracted a number of prominent money changers and is becoming renowned for its dealings involving foreign currency.
TEXT.Chinese: The Market in %s2_city has attracted a number of prominent money changers and is becoming renowned for its dealings involving foreign currency.

TEXT.English: Although %s2_city is used to some flooding during monsoon season, a rare and powerful monsoon has brought devastatingly strong floods this year.
TEXT.Chinese: Although %s2_city is used to some flooding during monsoon season, a rare and powerful monsoon has brought devastatingly strong floods this year.

TEXT.English: Our gold miners near %s2_city have struck the mother lode! We are rich, rich, rich!
TEXT.Chinese: Our gold miners near %s2_city have struck the mother lode! We are rich, rich, rich!

TEXT.English: Our chemists have developed an improved motor oil that lasts longer and lubricates engines better.
TEXT.Chinese: Our chemists have developed an improved motor oil that lasts longer and lubricates engines better.

TEXT.English: The old dynasty has died out! No more hereditary heirs remain to claim the throne!
TEXT.Chinese: The old dynasty has died out! No more hereditary heirs remain to claim the throne!

TEXT.English: Our civilization cries out for nobility to lead our people forward into a brighter future.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT], we should be able to find our way forward, through times peaceful or warlike.
TEXT.Chinese: Our civilization cries out for nobility to lead our people forward into a brighter future.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT], we should be able to find our way forward, through times peaceful or warlike.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.

TEXT.English: Our brightest admiral has proposed an amphibious assault strategy designed to capture port cities with lightning strikes.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we construct a large enough aircraft carrier battle fleet, we can bring any coastal city to its knees, making it much easier to attack amphibiously. We need a force large enough to disable all defenses with heavy shore bombardment and soften the defenders by bombing from the air. Then our troops may land on the same day the battle begins and thrust inland against a foe who will be in total disarray.
TEXT.Chinese: Our brightest admiral has proposed an amphibious assault strategy designed to capture port cities with lightning strikes.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we construct a large enough aircraft carrier battle fleet, we can bring any coastal city to its knees, making it much easier to attack amphibiously. We need a force large enough to disable all defenses with heavy shore bombardment and soften the defenders by bombing from the air. Then our troops may land on the same day the battle begins and thrust inland against a foe who will be in total disarray.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have built a powerful Aircraft Carrier battle fleet capable of conquering enemy cities in a single attack. A force capable of executing the Overwhelm Doctrine is now yours to command. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have built a powerful Aircraft Carrier battle fleet capable of conquering enemy cities in a single attack. A force capable of executing the Overwhelm Doctrine is now yours to command. Please choose your reward.

TEXT.English: Tamers have figured out how to farm the abundant supply of parrots within one of our tropical forest regions.
TEXT.Chinese: Tamers have figured out how to farm the abundant supply of parrots within one of our tropical forest regions.

TEXT.English: Our city of %s6_city has been destroyed by the rampaging %s1_civ_adjective army. Some of our citizens are forming partisan resistance!
TEXT.Chinese: Our city of %s6_city has been destroyed by the rampaging %s1_civ_adjective army. Some of our citizens are forming partisan resistance!

TEXT.English: Upon his passing, a patron of knowledge from %s2_city has willed his extensive collection of writings to the library.
TEXT.Chinese: Upon his passing, a patron of knowledge from %s2_city has willed his extensive collection of writings to the library.

TEXT.English: A wealthy family from %s2_city has discovered a cache of lost and rare writings in one of their vaults. They have opted to give these materials to the library.
TEXT.Chinese: A wealthy family from %s2_city has discovered a cache of lost and rare writings in one of their vaults. They have opted to give these materials to the library.

TEXT.English: Personal computers manufactured in %s2_city are in high demand among homes and small businesses.
TEXT.Chinese: Personal computers manufactured in %s2_city are in high demand among homes and small businesses.

TEXT.English: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Pasture near %s2_city, destroying all the livestock there.
TEXT.Chinese: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Pasture near %s2_city, destroying all the livestock there.

TEXT.English: Fire ant armies of massive proportion have laid waste to grazing lands near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Fire ant armies of massive proportion have laid waste to grazing lands near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Massive colonies of termites have overrun and destroyed some of our agriculture near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Massive colonies of termites have overrun and destroyed some of our agriculture near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Plantation near %s2_city, destroying all the crops there.
TEXT.Chinese: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Plantation near %s2_city, destroying all the crops there.

TEXT.English: Fire ant armies of massive proportion have laid waste a region of plantations lands near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Fire ant armies of massive proportion have laid waste a region of plantations lands near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Tamers have figured out how to domesticate the abundant supply of prairie dogs on the open range. They are now selling these as pets.
TEXT.Chinese: Tamers have figured out how to domesticate the abundant supply of prairie dogs on the open range. They are now selling these as pets.

TEXT.English: The invention of the Printing Press has unleashed a wave of new doctrines. Reformers all over the Catholic world are challenging the authority of the Pope over Christian theology. How shall we react?
TEXT.Chinese: 印刷术的发明引发了一场革新教义的浪潮。天主教世界的改革者们正在向教皇的权威发起挑战。我们该如何面对这场风波？

TEXT.English: Our shipmasters have devised a way to reinforce the hulls of our triremes. This will help with both ramming and being rammed.
TEXT.Chinese: Our shipmasters have devised a way to reinforce the hulls of our triremes. This will help with both ramming and being rammed.

TEXT.English: Our knowledge of rifled barrels has been successfully applied to new cannon designs.
TEXT.Chinese: Our knowledge of rifled barrels has been successfully applied to new cannon designs.

TEXT.English: The people of %s2_city have launched a popular new tradition called "Running With the Bulls."
TEXT.Chinese: The people of %s2_city have launched a popular new tradition called "Running With the Bulls."

TEXT.English: A grocer in %s2_city has struck a deal with rural farmers who live outside the normal range of business of any major city.
TEXT.Chinese: A grocer in %s2_city has struck a deal with rural farmers who live outside the normal range of business of any major city.

TEXT.English: Our bat herds in the hills near %s2_city, legendary in quantity, are now providing us surplus sources of saltpeter for use in gunpowder.
TEXT.Chinese: Our bat herds in the hills near %s2_city, legendary in quantity, are now providing us surplus sources of saltpeter for use in gunpowder.

TEXT.English: The locals have figured out the mating cycles of the sea turtles who flock to the shore in massive quantities. They have begun to harvest the turtles and eggs, in a way that does not endanger the long term survival of the creatures.
TEXT.Chinese: The locals have figured out the mating cycles of the sea turtles who flock to the shore in massive quantities. They have begun to harvest the turtles and eggs, in a way that does not endanger the long term survival of the creatures.

TEXT.English: A cache of ancient writings has been discovered hidden away in a cubby hole in a monastery in %s2_city!
TEXT.Chinese: A cache of ancient writings has been discovered hidden away in a cubby hole in a monastery in %s2_city!

TEXT.English: Our citizenry, fully protected by city walls, have accepted the burden of a Security Tax to help maintain their protection.
TEXT.Chinese: Our citizenry, fully protected by city walls, have accepted the burden of a Security Tax to help maintain their protection.

TEXT.English: Our researchers have experienced a setback in their efforts.
TEXT.Chinese: Our researchers have experienced a setback in their efforts.

TEXT.English: A slave revolt has taken place in %s2_city!
TEXT.Chinese: A slave revolt has taken place in %s2_city!

TEXT.English: The slaves in %s2_city have rebelled against their keepers. The city is in chaos.
TEXT.Chinese: The slaves in %s2_city have rebelled against their keepers. The city is in chaos.

TEXT.English: Production at %s2_city has been halted temporarily by rebellious slaves.
TEXT.Chinese: Production at %s2_city has been halted temporarily by rebellious slaves.

TEXT.English: The local authorities in %s2_city have so far been unable to put down the slave revolt.
TEXT.Chinese: The local authorities in %s2_city have so far been unable to put down the slave revolt.

TEXT.English: The slave revolt in %s2_city continues unabated. The economy there is at a standstill.
TEXT.Chinese: The slave revolt in %s2_city continues unabated. The economy there is at a standstill.

TEXT.English: The slaves of %s2_city are on the verge of revolt!
TEXT.Chinese: The slaves of %s2_city are on the verge of revolt!

TEXT.English: The invention of smokeless powder has improved the effectiveness of our muskets on the battlefield.
TEXT.Chinese: The invention of smokeless powder has improved the effectiveness of our muskets on the battlefield.

TEXT.English: A daring pilot has successfully flown around the globe in a single person airplane.
TEXT.Chinese: A daring pilot has successfully flown around the globe in a single person airplane.

TEXT.English: Most of the crude oil being pumped from one of our sites is thick with sulfur and other impurities. We are stuck with a source of sour crude!
TEXT.Chinese: Most of the crude oil being pumped from one of our sites is thick with sulfur and other impurities. We are stuck with a source of sour crude!

TEXT.English: An innovative chef has discovered a new type of spice, which grows only in a forest near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: An innovative chef has discovered a new type of spice, which grows only in a forest near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Vermin have gotten in to the granary in %s2_city. All the food stored there is spoiled.
TEXT.Chinese: Vermin have gotten in to the granary in %s2_city. All the food stored there is spoiled.

TEXT.English: Our cultural advisors believe that our nation could benefit from city-based sports franchises if we built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatres[COLOR_REVERT] to support national sports leagues.[PARAGRAPH:1]Each major city would require its own facility in which its teams could play.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的文化顾问认为：应该建造足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]供国家体育联合会举办城际体育赛事。[PARAGRAPH:1]每座主要城市都应该拥有自己的大型体育设施以便实行主客场赛制。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your sports entrepreneurs and built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatres[COLOR_REVERT] to support viable leagues. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new national pastimes can provide to you.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你！你已经建造了足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]以举办各种城际体育赛事，请在丰富的体育文化可带来的奖励中选择一项。

TEXT.English: A large order of stained glass has been shipped to %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: A large order of stained glass has been shipped to %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Weaponsmiths have improved the strength and durability of fittings used to make crossbows. This allows for stronger tension and improved power.
TEXT.Chinese: Weaponsmiths have improved the strength and durability of fittings used to make crossbows. This allows for stronger tension and improved power.

TEXT.English: The glorious city of %s2_city has added an underground railroad network to its mass transit system, greatly boosting commercial traffic.
TEXT.Chinese: The glorious city of %s2_city has added an underground railroad network to its mass transit system, greatly boosting commercial traffic.

TEXT.English: Imported %s1_civ_adjective tea has become all the rage amongst our social elite.
TEXT.Chinese: 自%s1_civ_adjective进口的茶饮料已成为我国社会精英阶层热烈追捧的时尚饮品。

TEXT.English: A new breed of race horse is generating a lot of revenue from our stables.
TEXT.Chinese: A new breed of race horse is generating a lot of revenue from our stables.

TEXT.English: A rich source of Tin has been discovered in the hills!
TEXT.Chinese: A rich source of Tin has been discovered in the hills!

TEXT.English: Election results are so close, they fall within the margin of error typically written off to system inadequacies such as lost or mismarked ballots, hanging chads, or counting errors. With no indisputable way to decipher the true vote count, the election's outcome has been placed in the hands of the courts.
TEXT.Chinese: Election results are so close, they fall within the margin of error typically written off to system inadequacies such as lost or mismarked ballots, hanging chads, or counting errors. With no indisputable way to decipher the true vote count, the election's outcome has been placed in the hands of the courts.

TEXT.English: The heavens opened up and down came the fist of retribution. Terrible twisting rages of air wiped away our %s8_improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: The heavens opened up and down came the fist of retribution. Terrible twisting rages of air wiped away our %s8_improvement.

TEXT.English: An extremely violent weather system filled with powerful tornadoes wrecked our %s8_improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: An extremely violent weather system filled with powerful tornadoes wrecked our %s8_improvement.

TEXT.English: A perfect storm spawned numerous F5 Class tornadoes, carving a path of destruction across our lands, smashing our %s8_improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: A perfect storm spawned numerous F5 Class tornadoes, carving a path of destruction across our lands, smashing our %s8_improvement.

TEXT.English: Invention of the tower shield has provided our foot soldiers with some protection against archers.
TEXT.Chinese: Invention of the tower shield has provided our foot soldiers with some protection against archers.

TEXT.English: With the establishment of our own Trading Company, our country's merchants are approaching you to take action to further assert their position in the South Asian markets.
TEXT.Chinese: 随着我们贸易公司的建立，我们国家的商人正根据你的意图采取行动，以便进一步巩固在南亚市场的地位。

TEXT.English: A rich source of truffles has been discovered in a series of caves. The locals have begun to farm them.
TEXT.Chinese: A rich source of truffles has been discovered in a series of caves. The locals have begun to farm them.

TEXT.English: A wall of water more than fifteen meters high has struck without warning at %s2_city. The tsunami has caused unprecedented destruction!
TEXT.Chinese: A wall of water more than fifteen meters high has struck without warning at %s2_city. The tsunami has caused unprecedented destruction!

TEXT.English: A volcano has erupted near %s2_city, spewing deadly ash clouds, lava flows, and mud- and debris-filled snow melts.
TEXT.Chinese: A volcano has erupted near %s2_city, spewing deadly ash clouds, lava flows, and mud- and debris-filled snow melts.

TEXT.English: Our military commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to rout our enemies on the field of battle!
TEXT.Chinese: Our military commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to rout our enemies on the field of battle!

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.

TEXT.English: Our naval commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme units[COLOR_REVERT], we could dominate the seas!
TEXT.Chinese: Our naval commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme units[COLOR_REVERT], we could dominate the seas!

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have built the world's largest combat navy. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.Chinese: Congratulations! You have built the world's largest combat navy. Please choose your reward.

TEXT.English: Floods have washed out the routes near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Floods have washed out the routes near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Folklore claims that the Waters of Life may be drawn from a certain oasis. Rumors are spreading that these waters can heal the sick and injured.
TEXT.Chinese: Folklore claims that the Waters of Life may be drawn from a certain oasis. Rumors are spreading that these waters can heal the sick and injured.

TEXT.English: A politically arranged marriage between one of our noble families and another %s1_civ_adjective family has collapsed over feuding about whether to hold the marriage in their tradition or to make it a %s4_religion_adjective wedding. Tensions are escalating.
TEXT.Chinese: 我国一个贵族世家和另一个%s1_civ_adjective家族之间的一场政治联姻因是否应按%s4_religion_adjective传统进行婚礼而争论不休，紧张局势逐步加剧。

TEXT.English: Two prominent families are feuding over their children, who eloped together against everybody else's wishes. %s1_civ_adjective leaders are particularly upset that the marriage was held in our %s4_religion_adjective tradition.
TEXT.Chinese: 两个有名望的家族为他们的孩子而发生争执，他们的孩子违背了家长的意愿一起私奔了。%s1_civ_adjective的领袖还因我们坚持按%s4_religion_adjective传统举行婚礼而感到不满。

TEXT.English: An industrial heiress from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has received a marriage proposal from one of our prominent business tycoons. The marriage is going forward, but the families on both sides are feuding over which religion should preside over the ceremony. The couple has decided on a %s4_religion_adjective wedding to the great annoyance of the bride's family.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective一家企业的女继承人收到我国一位商业大亨的求婚并欣然同意。但双方家族为应按何种宗教传统举行婚礼而各执己见。这对新人决定按%s4_religion_adjective传统举行婚礼以平息新娘家族的不满。

TEXT.English: Sailors have spotted a new population of whales.
TEXT.Chinese: Sailors have spotted a new population of whales.

TEXT.English: Monks from the Monastery in %s2_city have grown their private vinyards large enough for them to become nationally significant.
TEXT.Chinese: Monks from the Monastery in %s2_city have grown their private vinyards large enough for them to become nationally significant.

TEXT.English: Truffles! How delicious. Our people eat richly, do they not?
TEXT.Chinese: Truffles! How delicious. Our people eat richly, do they not?

TEXT.English: The city now lies in ruins. All life has been lost, all property obliterated.
TEXT.Chinese: The city now lies in ruins. All life has been lost, all property obliterated.

TEXT.English: The city has suffered massive loss of life and property. Recovery will take decades.
TEXT.Chinese: The city has suffered massive loss of life and property. Recovery will take decades.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Up to %d1 buildings destroyed in %s2_city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Up to %d1 buildings destroyed in %s2_city

TEXT.English: Heroes of the Sword
TEXT.Chinese: Heroes of the Sword

TEXT.English: Send what aid we can to the survivors. Be thankful that the city itself was not struck.
TEXT.Chinese: Send what aid we can to the survivors. Be thankful that the city itself was not struck.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Suffer loss of plot improvements near the eruption
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Suffer loss of plot improvements near the eruption

TEXT.English: War Chariots[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to train a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariots[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: War Chariots[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to train a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariots[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With such a large force of chariots working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.
TEXT.Chinese: With such a large force of chariots working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.

TEXT.English: Leverage our military advantage into a drive to spread our faith.
TEXT.Chinese: Leverage our military advantage into a drive to spread our faith.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]. A source of Horses will be required.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has a state religion.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Classical Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]. A source of Horses will be required.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has a state religion.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Classical Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: Warships[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your naval commanders to build a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Triremes[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: Warships[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your naval commanders to build a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Triremes[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With such a large fleet of warships, additional training for the crews can be achieved.
TEXT.Chinese: With such a large fleet of warships, additional training for the crews can be achieved.

TEXT.English: Leverage our dominance of the sea to better protect our trade routes.
TEXT.Chinese: Leverage our dominance of the sea to better protect our trade routes.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has built [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Renaissance without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has built [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Renaissance without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: We will have to send workers to repair them at a later time.
TEXT.Chinese: We will have to send workers to repair them at a later time.

TEXT.English: Dispatch emergency crews to repair the damage, without heed to cost.
TEXT.Chinese: Dispatch emergency crews to repair the damage, without heed to cost.

TEXT.English: This will attract more traffic to the oasis? That sounds good.
TEXT.Chinese: This will attract more traffic to the oasis? That sounds good.

TEXT.English: Send well wishes and a token wedding gift, trying not to further anger our neighbors.
TEXT.Chinese: Send well wishes and a token wedding gift, trying not to further anger our neighbors.

TEXT.English: Send hearty congratulations and a generous wedding gift.
TEXT.Chinese: Send hearty congratulations and a generous wedding gift.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] in all cities with %F3_religion for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] in all cities with %F3_religion for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns]

TEXT.English: Announce a national celebration, send an outlandish wedding gift and donate generously to our religious organizations in the name of the newlyweds. This is likely going to trigger war!
TEXT.Chinese: Announce a national celebration, send an outlandish wedding gift and donate generously to our religious organizations in the name of the newlyweds. This is likely going to trigger war!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] relations boost with all %F2_religion leaders
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] relations boost with all %F2_religion leaders
