TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has angered our people. Our rivals have granted no special gifts or attention, though, so our people are merely grumbling and fuming.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位我国显贵和一位%s1_civ_adjective人按%s5_religion_adjective传统举行的婚礼激起了我国人民的愤怒。不过对方国家并未采取挑衅行动，相信我们的人民也不会有更过激的反应。

TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has drawn our rivals' blessing with generous wedding gifts. Our people are outraged by this insult to our faith.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位我国显贵同一位%s1_civ_adjective人按%s5_religion_adjective传统举行了婚礼，对方国家为此送来祝福和丰厚的礼物。但他们对我们信仰的侮辱还是引发了国民的公愤。

TEXT.English: A %s1_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from %s2_civ has been honored by a national holiday by our rivals, including outlandish wedding gifts and donations to their religious institutions. This insult against our religious traditions has outraged our populace. Should we declare a holy war upon the unbelievers?
TEXT.Chinese: 一位我国显贵同一位%s2_civ人按%s1_religion_adjective传统举行了婚礼，对方下令举国欢庆并送来珍奇的礼物，还向他们的宗教机构捐献大笔金钱。他们对我们信仰的侮辱引起了国民的公愤，我们应该向这些异教徒发动圣战吗？

TEXT.English: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.
TEXT.Chinese: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.

TEXT.English: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.
TEXT.Chinese: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.

TEXT.English: Commit our government to harvesting this new resource immediately.
TEXT.Chinese: Commit our government to harvesting this new resource immediately.

TEXT.English: A %s4_civ_adjective passenger aircraft has crashed within %s1_civ_adjective territory. Neither side has provided any details of the incident.
TEXT.Chinese: 一架%s4_civ_adjective客机在%s1_civ_adjective境内坠毁。事件双方均未就此事透露任何细节。

TEXT.English: In the sands of a %s2_civ_adjective desert, archaeologists have unearthed a cache of ancient texts.
TEXT.Chinese: 考古学家在%s2_civ_adjective境内的沙漠中发掘出一批古籍。

TEXT.English: The %s2_city Games have become a unifying event for all those who are able to participate.
TEXT.Chinese: The %s2_city Games have become a unifying event for all those who are able to participate.

TEXT.English: The hospital in %s2_city is gaining favor among the pious because it is believed to be blessed by a spirit angel.
TEXT.Chinese: The hospital in %s2_city is gaining favor among the pious because it is believed to be blessed by a spirit angel.

TEXT.English: Antelope are thriving in %s1_civ_adjective territory well enough to serve as a new resource.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective境内的羚羊迅速繁育，可以用作新的食物资源。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective antimonarchists are protesting, saying that the religious institutions don't have enough power compared to the King.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的一些宗教人士发动示威抗议君主专制，要求提高教会的地位以制衡国王的权力。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective folk hero has caused the creation of a new forest of apple trees.
TEXT.Chinese: 在一位%s1_civ_adjective民间植树英雄的带领下，人们创造了一处繁茂的苹果树林。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective soldiers have rallied behind their heroes of the sword.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的勇士们聚集在战争英雄的麾下。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective craftsmen have improved the design of their axe manufacturing. These are the finest axes in the world.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的工匠改进了斧柄设计，制造出全世界最精良的战斧。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective soldiers and their wives are celebrating the end of war by creating a baby boom.
TEXT.Chinese: 退伍的%s1_civ_adjective战士和他们的妻子努力生养儿女以庆祝战争结束，由此导致了一场婴儿潮。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective population is growing rapidly as a post-war baby boom sweeps through their settlements.
TEXT.Chinese: 受战后婴儿潮的影响，%s1_civ_adjective的人口正迅速增长。

TEXT.English: Invention of the banana split by a %s1_civ_adjective businessman has led to booming ice cream sales for their vendors.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective商家发明了“香蕉船”冰淇淋，使得冰激凌销售量大幅增长。

TEXT.English: A heartrending ballad written by an artist in %s2_city is inspiring cultural pride amongst the %s1_civ_adjective people.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位艺术家创作的一首感人的民谣唤起了%s1_civ_adjective人的文化自豪感。

TEXT.English: A songwriter from %s2_city has gained local and national recognition, strengthening %s1_civ_adjective culture.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位艺术家创作的歌曲广受欢迎，加强了%s1_civ_adjective的文化影响力。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective ships and planes have disappeared without a trace in the Bermuda Triangle!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的飞机和轮船连续在“百慕大三角”海域神秘失踪。

TEXT.English: The sturdy %s1_civ_adjective people have completed The Best Defense quest!
TEXT.Chinese: 坚强的%s1_civ_adjective人民胜利完成了“顶级防御”任务！

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective scientists have developed better ways of processing coal fuel.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的科学家发明了更先进的煤炭深加工技术。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling black pearls in larger quantities.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective商人开始批量销售黑珍珠。

TEXT.English: %s4_religion_adjective leaders have bestowed grand rewards upon the %s1_civ_adjective people for completing the Quest of the Blessed Sea!
TEXT.Chinese: “受祝福的海洋”任务完成了，%s4_religion_adjective的精神领袖为此赐予%s1_civ_adjective人民巨大的奖赏。

TEXT.English: Severe winter weather is plaguing the %s1_civ_adjective people near their city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city遭遇百年一遇的严冬。

TEXT.English: A blizzard has dumped disastrous quantities of snow upon a %s1_civ_adjective region near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 猛烈的暴风雪袭击了%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective factories are benefitting from a new boiler design, providing a short term rise in their tax revenue.
TEXT.Chinese: 一种新型锅炉的普及提升了%s1_civ_adjective工业能力，国家税收因而迅速增长。

TEXT.English: A master bowyer has developed techniques that improve the strength of all %s1_civ_adjective war bows.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位制弓大师改进了弓弩制造技术，使%s1_civ_adjective部队装备的弓弩更加强劲。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective researchers are rumored to have made a technological breakthrough, rapidly advancing their progress.
TEXT.Chinese: 据报%s1_civ_adjective科学家在技术上取得突破，使其研究进度快速增长。

TEXT.English: Discoveries made by the %s1_civ_adjective Empire have boosted progress on their current research project.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的最新发现使他们在现有研究项目上取得突破。

TEXT.English: The dam in %s2_city has broken, flooding the city's suburbs and killing people.
TEXT.Chinese: The dam in %s2_city has broken, flooding the city's suburbs and killing people.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective leaders have met with their %s4_civ_adjective %s3_religion_adjective brothers to discuss the possibility of sending them strategic resources to aid in their war effort.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective领袖已与同样信仰%s3_religion_adjective的%s4_civ_adjective领袖会面，讨论是否需要向对方提供战争援助。

TEXT.English: A fire has destroyed the Forge in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 一场大火烧毁了%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city的煅造厂。

TEXT.English: A champion unit has emerged from the war games conducted by the %s1_civ_adjective military. This unit is rumored to be the strongest and toughest amongst all their forces.
TEXT.Chinese: A champion unit has emerged from the war games conducted by the %s1_civ_adjective military. This unit is rumored to be the strongest and toughest amongst all their forces.

TEXT.English: A charismatic %s1_civ_adjective dictator has risen to control the Party. This strong man is reshaping the government to suit his plans.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位魅力超群的独裁者掌握了%s1_civ_adjective的最高权力，并通过铁腕手段改组政府以实现他的个人野心。

TEXT.English: A pilot from %s2_city has inspired pride amongst the %s1_civ_adjective people by becoming the first to fly solo over the North Pole.
TEXT.Chinese: 来自%s2_city的一位飞行员首次独自飞越北极，这一英雄壮举激发了%s1_civ_adjective人的民族自豪感。

TEXT.English: Fire has destroyed the Theatre in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Fire has destroyed the Theatre in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuable information buried in ruins near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective探险队在%s2_city附近发现了埋藏在废墟中的重要资料。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective game designers have developed a new game of Civilization.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的游戏设计师开发了一款全新电脑游戏――《文明》。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ scholars have successfully recorded all of their oral traditions and stories in to a new compendium of literature, thereby completing the quest of Classic Literature!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ学者对本民族的口头传说故事进行了全面的记录和整理，从而胜利完成了“经典文学”任务！

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are offering discounts on tons of their clunker coal, which is filled with impurities.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective商人开始倾销劣质煤炭。

TEXT.English: A comet fragment has struck the earth in a remote tundra region, obliterating a whole forest. %s1_civ_adjective scientists are scrambling like mad to learn more about potential threats posed to our planet by other rogue heavenly bodies: comets, asteroids, meteors, and whatever else may be lurking out there.
TEXT.Chinese: 一块彗星碎片撞击地球，坠落在寒冷的冻土地带，大片森林被摧毁。%s1_civ_adjective的科学家们正在紧张地研究各种对对地球构成潜在威胁的天体，包括彗星、小行星及流星。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective philosopher has stirred up controversy among the religious population.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位%s1_civ_adjective哲学家提出的新学说在虔诚的教徒中引发了激烈的争议。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion. %s6_corporation profits expected to skyrocket.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective完成了“商业扩张”任务，正如预期的那样，%s6_corporation的收益像宇宙火箭般迅速窜升。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective crab cake sales are booming.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的蟹肉饼销售量大幅增长。

TEXT.English: Scandal has thrown the %s1_civ_adjective senate in to chaos. A constitutional crisis has emerged. Yet this also opens the door to political reforms.
TEXT.Chinese: Scandal has thrown the %s1_civ_adjective senate in to chaos. A constitutional crisis has emerged. Yet this also opens the door to political reforms.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective armies have completed their Crusade, wresting control of the Holy City of %s2_city away from the %s4_civ_adjective people!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的军队发动了一场圣战，从%s4_civ_adjective异教徒手中夺取了圣城%s2_city。

TEXT.English: A massive cyclone has made landfall at the %s1_civ city of %s2_city, causing widespread wind and storm surge damage.
TEXT.Chinese: 特大飓风在%s1_civ的%s2_city登陆，狂风和海浪造成了巨大的破坏。

TEXT.English: A high-ranking %s1_civ_adjective intelligence agent has defected to the %s4_civ_adjective government.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective chemists have developed an advanced refinement process for motor oil.

TEXT.Chinese: 据报%s1_civ_adjective正对其三层桨战船进行技术改装。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective Cannon units can now shoot farther and more accurately thanks to improved barrel design.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的工程师改进了炮管设计，大大提升了加农炮的射程和精度。

TEXT.English: A rogue radio station in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city is broadcasting propaganda against the ruling party.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective%s2_city的一家电台发起宣传攻势，鼓动民众反对执政党。

TEXT.English: "Running With the Bulls", an annual ritual practiced by the people of %s2_city, is gaining worldwide renown.
TEXT.Chinese: "Running With the Bulls", an annual ritual practiced by the people of %s2_city, is gaining worldwide renown.

TEXT.English: Enterprising %s1_civ_adjective grocers in %s2_city have struck a deal to import surplus food from rural farmers outside the normal range of city business.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective%s2_city的杂货商与远郊区的农民签订了粮食收购协议。

TEXT.English: The Grocer in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city is becoming renowned for its superior selection, quality and quantity of foodstuffs.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective%s2_city的杂货店以其质量优异、货物充足、品种多样而享誉四方。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling gunpowder in larger quantities.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective商人开始批量销售火药。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective people are now harvesting sea turtles on an annual basis.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective人开始大量捕捉海龟。

TEXT.English: A cache of ancient texts has been discovered hidden away in a %s1_civ_adjective monastery.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s1_civ_adjective的一座修道院里发现了一批古籍。

TEXT.English: The well-protected %s1_civ_adjective citizens endure paying a Security Tax to help maintain their city walls and guards.
TEXT.Chinese: 获得良好保护的%s1_civ_adjective居民被迫额外交纳“安全税”，用于维护城墙及供养守卫。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective researchers are rumored to have suffered a major setback, slowing their progress.
TEXT.Chinese: 据报%s1_civ_adjective科学家遭遇重大挫折，使得研究进度放缓。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective discoveries have turned out to be false! This dead end result has slowed their current research project.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的一项新发现被证明是错误的！研究被迫进度放缓。

TEXT.English: A slave revolt has taken place in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city!
TEXT.Chinese: A slave revolt has taken place in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city!

TEXT.English: The slaves in %s2_city are still in revolt. Local authorities are bumbling the crackdown.
TEXT.Chinese: The slaves in %s2_city are still in revolt. Local authorities are bumbling the crackdown.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective weaponsmiths have invented smokeless powder, giving their musketmen a significant advantage.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的武器工匠发明了无烟火药，使火枪手的战斗力获得提升。

TEXT.English: A daring %s1_civ_adjective pilot is the first to fly solo around the world, lifting spirits across the globe and winning admiration from all of humanity.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位勇敢的%s1_civ_adjective飞行员首次完成了单人环球飞行，他的英雄壮举赢得了全世界的赞誉。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are offering discounts on barrels of their sour crude oil, which is filled with impurities.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective商人开始倾销劣质原油。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective chef has identified a new and valuable type of spice.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位%s1_civ_adjective的厨师发现了一种珍贵的新香料。

TEXT.English: Vermin got in to the granary in %s2_city. All the food stored there was ruined.
TEXT.Chinese: Vermin got in to the granary in %s2_city. All the food stored there was ruined.

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective cities have built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatres[COLOR_REVERT] to complete the National Sports League quest, strengthening their social fabric and their national identity.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective通过建造足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]胜利完成了“国家体育联合会”任务，增强社会凝聚力和民族认同感。

TEXT.English: A %s4_civ_adjective infiltrator has been dicovered in the %s1_civ_adjective government.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective政府内部发现了一名潜伏的%s4_civ_adjective间谍。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective stained glass sales are booming.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的彩色玻璃销售量大幅增长。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective Crossbow units are rumored to be carrying improved weapons. Specifics on how or why their bows are stronger remains a mystery.
TEXT.Chinese: 据报%s1_civ_adjective军队开始装备新式劲弩，这种强大武器的技术细节被严格保密。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective metropolis of %s2_city has constructed a mass transit marvel: an underground railroad network. They are calling it the Subway.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective%s2_city这座现代化大都市完成了宏伟地下轨道公共交通网络，人们称之为“地铁”。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective citizens who are socially advanced have adopted imported %s4_civ_adjective tea as their beverage of choice.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective上流社会饮用自%s4_civ_adjective进口的茶饮料已蔚然成风。

TEXT.English: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Goths have gathered an army and their axemen seek to plunder civilizations.
TEXT.Chinese: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Goths have gathered an army and their axemen seek to plunder civilizations.

TEXT.English: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Attila the Hun leads his forces in a crusade against the very concept of civilization.
TEXT.Chinese: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Attila the Hun leads his forces in a crusade against the very concept of civilization.

TEXT.English: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Philistines have gathered an army of spearmen and are on the march.
TEXT.Chinese: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Philistines have gathered an army of spearmen and are on the march.

TEXT.English: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Vandals strike out against civilization, seeking to claim its prizes with their swords.
TEXT.Chinese: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Vandals strike out against civilization, seeking to claim its prizes with their swords.

TEXT.English: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Vedic Aryans seek to plunder the riches of civilization.
TEXT.Chinese: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Vedic Aryans seek to plunder the riches of civilization.

TEXT.English: Thoroughbred race horses raised by %s1_civ_adjective breeders have generated extra revenue for their treasury.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective繁育的纯种赛马在世界市场上广受欢迎。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has become the world's leading producer of tin.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective成为世界产锡大国。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective election results were so close, the courts had to rule on the vote-counting procedures to arrive at an outcome.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective大选的票数是如此接近，宪法法院不得不下令重新计票以获得准确结果。

TEXT.English: Vicious tornadoes carved a path of destruction through the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 强烈的飓风横扫%s1_civ_adjective，沿途留下一片废墟。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective infrastructure was wiped out by a deadly thunderstorm and the violent twisters it spawned.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的基础设施遭到雷暴和飓风的严重破坏。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective Melee units are now deployed with new, larger shields, improving their defense versus Archery units.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective Melee units are now deployed with new, larger shields, improving their defense versus Archery units.

TEXT.English: The man who is Tezcatlipoca's likeness has escaped during this year's Toxcatl feast in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s1_civ_adjective举行的托克斯卡特尔祭礼上，一名特兹凯里波卡神选定的年轻人挣脱锁链逃走了。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Trading Company considers to take further actions to enforce its South Asian market position.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective正采取行动，以巩固其在南亚市场的地位。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective people are bragging about their truffles, claiming they are the most delicious in the world.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective人声称该国出产的块菌是世界上最美味的食物。

TEXT.English: A tsunami more than fifteen meters high has rolled over the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city. The destruction is unprecedented in world history.
TEXT.Chinese: 高达15米的海啸袭击了%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city，造成史上罕有的巨大破坏。

TEXT.English: A volcanic eruption near %s2_city has devastated the countryside. Fortunately, the %s1_civ_adjective city itself was spared.
TEXT.Chinese: 火山喷发对%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city周边地区造成严重破坏，城市本身则幸运地逃过此劫。

TEXT.English: The earth has spewed forth lava and ash from a previously dormant volcano near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city附近，一座休眠火山突然猛烈喷发。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of Chariot units. Advisors across the known world are panicking at the thought of their nation being ground under the thundering hooves and churning wheels of these mighty war machines.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective建立了一支强大的战车部队。各国统治者都被这些战争机器的铁蹄和车轮巨大的轰鸣声吓得心慌意乱！

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest fleet of warships. Advisors across the known world whisper of their fears that this fleet will dominate the seas for centuries to come.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective建立了全世界最强大的海军。各国统治者都在担心这支无敌舰队将长期称霸海洋。

TEXT.English: Floods have washed out some of the routes near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective发生洪灾，%s2_city附近的道路被冲毁。

TEXT.English: The Waters of Life, drawn from a certain oasis in %s2_civ_adjective lands, are rumored to be able to cure the sick and heal the injured.
TEXT.Chinese: 据传%s2_civ_adjective境内的某个绿洲存在一眼能够治病疗伤的“生命之泉”。

TEXT.English: Nobles from a %s4_civ_adjective family are angry with their new %s1_civ_adjective inlaws for holding a %s3_religion_adjective wedding against their wishes. This event has drawn great interest within these nations as feuding has broken out over the dispute.
TEXT.Chinese: 一个%s4_civ_adjective的贵族世家对他们的%s1_civ_adjective亲家表示非常愤怒，因为按%s3_religion_adjective传统举行的婚礼违背了他们的意愿。这件事引起了极大的关注，一场争端因此而引发。

TEXT.English: A new source of Whales has been located off the %s1_civ_adjective coast.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s1_civ_adjective的领海发现了大量鲸鱼。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective monks who have grown their vinyards over the years are now producing Wines in significant quantities.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的僧侣们努力经营葡萄园，出产了大批美酒。

TEXT.English: Radiation leaks have been discovered in the reactor of the Nuclear Plant in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Radiation leaks have been discovered in the reactor of the Nuclear Plant in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Radiation leaks have been discovered in the reactor of the Nuclear Plant in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Radiation leaks have been discovered in the reactor of the Nuclear Plant in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: The radioactive leaks in Nuclear Plant in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city are still not contained.
TEXT.Chinese: The radioactive leaks in Nuclear Plant in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city are still not contained.

TEXT.English: Our inspectors are still reporting radiation leaks in the Nuclear Plant in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: Our inspectors are still reporting radiation leaks in the Nuclear Plant in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Our reactors are safe. Contain the leaks, but there is no need for further action.
TEXT.Chinese: Our reactors are safe. Contain the leaks, but there is no need for further action.

TEXT.English: Leaks like these are dangerous. We must invest in modernizing our reactors to keep them safe for the future.
TEXT.Chinese: Leaks like these are dangerous. We must invest in modernizing our reactors to keep them safe for the future.

TEXT.English: This shows that nuclear energy is too dangerous for our society. Make plans to transition out of nuclear power as soon as possible.
TEXT.Chinese: This shows that nuclear energy is too dangerous for our society. Make plans to transition out of nuclear power as soon as possible.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Medium risk of a nuclear meltdown.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Radiation leaks may continue.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Medium risk of a nuclear meltdown.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Radiation leaks may continue.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Low risk of a nuclear meltdown.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Radiation leaks may continue.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Low risk of a nuclear meltdown.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Radiation leaks may continue.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Nuclear Plants will become obsolete.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]Nuclear Plants will become obsolete.

TEXT.English: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.
TEXT.Chinese: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.

TEXT.English: The Harbormaster[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your merchant marine industry to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] for them to become the undisputed trading kings of the sea. You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.
TEXT.Chinese: The Harbormaster[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your merchant marine industry to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] for them to become the undisputed trading kings of the sea. You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has built [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has built [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.
